quote: You have to learn the rules of the game. And then you have to play better than anyone else.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The one who stops growing because he thinks he knows it all, and has everything is still far from reaching his potential and would fall when storms come.
author: Anonymous

quote: No one ever attains success by simply doing what is required of him.
author: Charles Kendall Adams

quote: The future belongs to those who prepare for it today.
author: Malcolm X

quote: You shouldn't gloat about anything you've done; you ought to keep going and find something better to do.
author: David Packard

quote: Change your thoughts and change your world.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: Laziness is a secret ingredient that goes into failure. But it's only kept a secret from the person who fails.
author: Robert Half

quote: Even if you have the qualifications on paper, a lack of social intelligence could lead to strained or ruined relationships, as well as lost opportunities.
author: Will Chou

quote: For Barack, success isn't about how much money you make. It's about the difference you make in people's lives.
author: Michelle Obama

quote: The very best thing you can do for the whole world is to make the most of yourself.
author: Wallace Wattles

quote: I will build a motor car for the great multitude. It will be large enough for the family but small enough for the individual to run and care for. It will be constructed of the best materials, by the best men to be hired, after the simplest designs that modern engineering can devise. But it will be so low in price that no man making a good salary will be unable to own one and enjoy with his family the blessings of hours of pleasure in God's great open spaces.
author: Henry Ford's vision

quote: If there is no struggle, there is no progress Those who profess to favour freedom, and yet depreciate agitation, are men who want crops without blowing up the ground. They want rain without thunder and lightning. They want the ocean without the awful roar of its many waters. This struggle may be a moral one, or it may be a physical one; or it may be both moral and physical; but it must be a struggle.
author: Frederick Douglass

quote: We are all motivated by a keen desire for praise, and the better a man is, the more he is inspired by glory.
author: Cicero

quote: There are three kinds of people: Those who make things happen, those who watch things happen, and those who ask, 'What happened?'
author: Casey Stengel

quote: If you want to turn your life around, try thankfulness. It will change your life mightily.
author: Gerald Good

quote: As it is our nature to be more moved by hope than fear, the example of one we see abundantly rewarded cheers and encourages us far more than the sight of many who have not been well treated disquiets us.
author: Faranciso Gucciardini

quote: Nobody who ever gave his best regretted it.
author: George S. Halas

quote: Don't let other people tell you what you want.
author: Pat Riley

quote: Whatever you are thinking'.THINK BIGGER!
author: Tony Hsieh

quote: I will persist until I succeed. Always will I take another step, if that is of no avail I will take another, and yet another. In truth, one step at a time is not too difficult. I know that small attempts, repeated, will complete any undertaking.
author: Og Mandino

quote: A man always has two reasons for doing anything: a good reason and the real reason.
author: J.P. Morgan

quote: When I feel tired, I just think about how great I will feel, once I finally reach my goal.
author: Michael Phelps

quote: When I examine myself and my methods of thought, I come close to the conclusion that the gift of imagination has meant more to me than my talent for absorbing absolute knowledge
author: Albert Einstein

quote: If one advances confidently in the direction of his dreams, and endeavours to live the life he has imagined, he will meet with a success unexpected in common hours.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: To be ignorant of the lives of the most celebrated men of antiquity is to continue in a state of childhood.
author: Plutarch

quote: Everyone is a teacher and everyone is a learner.
author: George Couros

quote: Life appears to me too short to be spent in nursing animosity or registering wrongs.
author: Charlotte Bront

quote: Greatness isn't born, it is grown.
author: Daniel Coyle

quote: To succeed in your mission, you must have single-minded devotion to your goal.
author: A.P.J Abdul Kalam

quote: If I have seen farther than others, it is because I was standing on the shoulders of giants.
author: Isaac Newton

quote: People who accomplished great things often combined a passion for a single mission with an unswerving dedication to achieve that mission, whatever the obstacles and however long it might take.
author: Duckworth

quote: A mistake is an event, the full benefit of which has not yet been turned to your advantage.
author: Ed Land

quote: All great achievements in science start from intuitive knowledge, namely, in axioms, from which deductions are then made. ' Intuition is the necessary condition for the discovery of such axioms.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: I'm a very positive thinker, and I think that is what helps me the most in difficult moments.
author: Roger Federer

quote: It isn't our position, but our disposition, that makes us happy.
author: Anonymous

quote: When life's problems seem overwhelming, look around and see what other people are coping with. You may consider yourself fortunate.
author: Ann Landers

quote: Be patient and understanding. Life is too short to be vengeful or malicious.
author: Phillips Brooks

quote: You may not realize it when it happens, but a kick in the teeth may be the best thing in the world for you
author: Walt Disney

quote: A little learning is a dangerous thing.
author: Alexander Pope

quote: One problem is that people with the fixed mind-set expect everything good to happen automatically. It's not that the partners will work to help each other solve their problems or gain skills. It's that this will magically occur through their love, sort of the way it happened to Sleeping Beauty, whose coma was cured by her prince's kiss, or to Cinderella, whose miserable life was suddenly transformed by her prince.
author: Maria Popova

quote: A growth mind-set leads individuals to believe learning comes from struggling with new challenges, thus enabling improved performance over time.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: But when people are in a growth mind-set, difficulty is a natural part of learning, so they are more likely to take it in stride and find new strategies that work better.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: A prudent person profits from personal experience, a wise one from the experience of others.
author: Dr Joseph Collins

quote: There's only one corner of the universe you can be certain of improving, and that's your own self.
author: Aldous Huxley

quote: I am building a fire, and every day I train, I add more fuel. At just the right moment, I light the match.
author: Mia Hamm, gold-medal soccer player

quote: We often take for granted the very things that most deserve our gratitude.
author: Cynthia Ozick

quote: One of the secrets of life is to keep our intellectual curiosity acute.
author: William Lyon Phelps

quote: Just do it.
author: Nike

quote: The important thing is not to stop questioning. Curiosity has its own reason for existing.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Whenever you see a successful person, you only see the public glories, never the private sacrifices to reach them.
author: Vaibhav Shah

quote: Apply yourself both now and in the next life. Without effort, you cannot be prosperous. Though the land be good, you cannot have an abundant crop without cultivation.
author: Plato

quote: Appreciation is a wonderful thing. It makes what is excellent in others belong to us as well.
author: Voltaire

quote: No one cares how much you know, until they know how much you care.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Choose growth over comfort, your success depends on it.
author: Margie Warrell

quote: The best way for a person to have happy thoughts is to count his blessing and not his cash.
author: Anonymous

quote: Everybody needs encouragement. None of us achieves anything without help. The great achievers in history became all that they were because of the people in their lives. It was Tolkein who encouraged Lewis, an avowed atheist, to explore Christianity, ultimately leading to his conversion. It was Lewis who encouraged Tolkein to continue writing fiction and to seek publication. Were it not for the friendship and mutual encouragement, the world wouldn't have received the finest writing in apologetic of the twentieth century (The chronicles of Narnia by C. S. Lewis) and one of the finest fantasy works (The Lord of the Rings by J. R. R. Tolkien).
author: The author

quote: Positive thinking is essential for success.
author: unknown

quote: To see things in the seed, that is a genius
author: Lao Tzu

quote: There's always a point where you get knocked down. But I draw on what I've learned on the track: If you work hard, things will work out.
author: Lolo Jones,

quote: Have a mentality of abundance.
author: Steve Covey

quote: It is nice to feel like you made a difference, inventing something or raising kids or helping people in need.
author: Bill Gates

quote: Knowledge and information are crucial to creation.
author: George Couros

quote: Success isn't about avoiding failure. It's about learning from failure.
author: Unknown

quote: Patience and tenacity are worth more than twice their weight of cleverness.
author: Thomas Huxley

quote: It is as true as night follows day that the man who does more than he is paid for, and does it in a pleasant mental attitude, sooner or later is paid for more than he does.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: The sun doesn't stop shining because of a few clouds block its sparkle. You shouldn't stop radiating your potential for the sake of a few irrational and self-limiting doubts.
author: Unknown

quote: Achievement is the product of talent and effort, the latter a function of the intensity, direction, and duration of one's exertions towards a long-term goal.
author: Angela Duckworth

quote: Failure is only postponed success as long as courage coaches ambition. The habit of persistence is the habit of victory.
author: Herbert Kaufman

quote: Patience is a nobler motion than any deed.
author: C. A. Bartol

quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream
author: C. S. Lewis

quote: An organisation's ability to learn and translate that learning into action is the ultimate competitive advantage.
author: Jack Welch

quote: Clear feedback is the cornerstone of improvement.
author: Sir David Brailsford

quote: Intellectual capital will always trump financial capital.
author: Paul Tudor Jones

quote: Have the courage to follow your heart and intuition. They somehow already know what you truly want to become. Everything else is secondary.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: I'm often asked how I define 'success.' It's an overused term, but I fundamentally view this elusive beast as a combination of two things, achievement and appreciation. One isn't enough: Achievement without appreciation makes you ambitious but miserable. Appreciation without achievement makes you unambitious but happy.
author: Tim Ferriss

quote: We cannot tell what may happen to us in the strange medley of life. But we can decide what happens in us, how we can take it, what we do with it and that is what really counts in the end.
author: Joseph Fort Newton

quote: The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather in a lack of will.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Most people fail, not through lack of education, but from lack of dogged determination, from lack of dauntless will.
author: Orison Sweet Marden

quote: Deliberate practice is a structured and specific set of personalized development activities.
author: Geoff Colvin

quote: Insecure people put others down to raise themselves.
author: Habeeb Akande

quote: People with growth mind-set fosters a hunger for feedback and a greater ability to deal with setbacks and significantly better performance over time.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: Don't be afraid of failure, don't be afraid to innovate, don't be afraid of new arenas.
author: Elon Musk

quote: Daily : Think positive. Read positive. Listen positive. Talk positive. Affirm positive. Watch positive. Practice positive. Make yourself positive.
author: Honoree Corder

quote: It is during our last moments that we must focus to see the light.
author: Aristotle Onassis

quote: Don't underestimate the power of a vision. McDonald's founder, Ray Kroc, pictured his empire long before it existed, and he saw how to get there. He invented the company motto - 'Quality, service, cleanliness and value', and kept repeating it to employees for the rest of his life.
author: Kenneth Labich

quote: With ordinary talent and extraordinary perseverance all things are attainable.
author: Sir Thomas Buxton

quote: Sometimes we may ask God for success, and He gives us physical and mental stamina. We might plead for prosperity, and we receive enlarged perspective and increased patience, or we petition for growth and are blessed with the gift of grace. He may bestow upon us conviction and confidence as we strive to achieve worthy goals.
author: David A. Bednar

quote: On the highest throne in the world, we still sit only on our own bottom.
author: Michel de Montaigne

quote: Despite their early failures, they went on to achieve greatness:
author: Unknown

quote: Talent hits a target no one else can hit. Genius hits a target no one else can see.
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: Develop a passion for learning. If you do, you will never cease to grow.
author: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quote: Great things are not something accidental, but must certainly be willed.
author: Vincent van Gogh

quote: Every age has a keyhole to which its eye is pasted.
author: Mary McCarthy.

quote: When men are rightly occupied, their amusement grows out of their work, as the colour-petals out of a fruitful flower.
author: John Ruskin

quote: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Every success story is a tale of constant adaption, revision and change.
author: Richard Branson

quote: You need to do more than setting a goal
author: Unknown

quote: A goal without a plan is a wish.
author: Larry Elder

quote: Every one that exalted himself shall be abased; and he that humbled himself shall be exalted.
author: BIBLE: Luke 18

quote: The whole art of teaching is only the art of awakening the natural curiosity of young minds for the purpose of satisfying it afterwards.
author: Anatole France

quote: Records are always made to be broken no matter what they are. Anybody can do anything that they set their mind to.
author: Michael Phelps

quote: Forgiveness does not change the past, but it does enlarge the future.
author: Paul Boese

quote: All men make mistakes, but only wise'men learn from their mistakes.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: My personal goals are to be happy, healthy and to be surrounded by loved ones.
author: Kiana Tom

quote: Attitudes are a secret power working 24 hours a day, for good or bad.
author: Unknown

quote: Feedback is the breakfast of champions.
author: Ken Blanchard

quote: Never Feel ..Threatened by the success of others...Mind-set: The New Psychology of Success.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: The principle of life is that life responds by corresponding; your life becomes the thing you have decided it shall be.
author: Raymond Charles Barker

quote: Criticism is something we can avoid easily by saying nothing, doing nothing, and being nothing.
author: Aristotle

quote: I can understand wanting to have millions of dollars, there's a certain freedom, meaningful freedom that comes with that. But once you get much beyond that, I have to tell you, it's the same hamburger.
author: Bill Gates

quote: Happiness is not in the mere possession of money; it lies in the joy of achievement, in the thrill of creative effort.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: No one lives long enough to learn everything they need to learn starting from scratch. To be successful, we absolutely, positively have to find people who have already paid the price to learn the things that we need to learn to achieve our goal.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: Success is what you do with your ability. It's how you use your talent.
author: George Allen, Sr.

quote: Love teaches even asses to dance.
author: French Proverb

quote: People with the growth mind-set believe that basic qualities, including intelligence, can be strengthened like muscles.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: Nothing worthwhile comes easily. Half effort does not produce half results, it produces no results. Work, continuous work and hard work is the only way to accomplish results that last.
author: Hamilton Holt.

quote: Urgent necessity prompts many to do things.
author: Miguel de Caervantes

quote: Be curious. Read'widely. Try new things. What people call intelligence just boils down to curiosity.
author: Aaron Swartz

quote: We all have dreams. But in order to make dreams come into reality, it takes an awful lot of determination, dedication, self-discipline, and effort.
author: Jesse Owens

quote: Nobody made a greater mistake than he who did nothing because he could do only a little.
author: Edmund Burke

quote: Change your mind and you change your life.
author: Jeffrey Keller

quote: Tis better to bear the ills we have than fly to others that we know not of.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Life is a journey. When we stop, things don't go right.
author: Pope Francis

quote: Start where you are. Use what you have.' Do what you can.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: A river cuts through rock, not because of its power, but because of its persistence.
author: Jim Watkins

quote: There is a kind of victory in good work no matter how humble.
author: Jack Kemp

quote: The best thing a human being can do is to help another human being know more.
author: Charlie Munger

quote: Nothing arouses ambition so much as the trumpet clang of another' fame.
author: Baltasar Gracian

quote: People with fixed mind-set give up easily when faced with obstacles.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: In my whole life, I have known no wise people (over a broad subject matter area) who didn't read all the time. - none. Zero.
author: Charlie Munger

quote: Attitude: the mental filter through which you see the world; the way you view something or tend to behave towards it.
author: Jeffrey Keller

quote: I firmly believe the moment you stop learning is the moment you stop living.
author: Aashish Dalal,

quote: The best possible investment you can make in your future is an education.
author: Unknown

quote: He who wrestles with us, strengthens our nerves and sharpens our skills. Our antagonist is our helper.
author: Edmund Burke

quote: Learn to be thankful for what you already have, while you pursue all that you want.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Learn to see the difference between constructive and destructive criticism.
author: Anonymous

quote: You can achieve anything you want in life if you have the courage to dream it, the intelligence to make a realistic plan, and the will to see that plan through to the end.
author: Sidney A. Friedman

quote: When love and skill work together, expect a masterpiece.
author: John Ruskin

quote: A single conversation with a wise man is worth a month's study of books
author: A Chinese Proverb

quote: Setbacks are just learning experiences.
author: Beth Brooke

quote: An investment in knowledge pays the best dividends.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: I have learned to make a lot of effort and sacrifice for this sport, and now I can say it's paying me back. So it is important to always show determination and effort on the pitch.
author: Stephan El Shaarawy.

quote: If you could only love enough, you could be the most powerful person in the world.
author: Emmet Fox

quote: If one does not constantly improve, one stays behind. People must always stay on top of their game, whether through forward thinking or innovative actions. We live in a remarkable age in which technology is evolving rapidly and assisting us in continually improving ourselves and our work methods. Immerse yourself in change. Don't be afraid of it.
author: Ayelet Noff, Carpe diem

quote: Things are in their essence, what we choose to make them. A thing according to the mode in which one looks at it
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Don't let anyone rob you of your imagination, your creativity, or your curiosity. It's your place in the world; it's your life. Go on and do all you can with it, and make it the life you want to live.
author: Mae Jemison

quote: People with growth mind-set believe that with effort through increased learning they can succeed.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: To have a grievance is to have a purpose in life.
author: Eric Hoffer

quote: Character is like a tree and reputation like a shadow. The shadow is what we think of it; the tree is the real thing.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Life is what you make it. So why not make it a beautiful one full of happiness and joy.
author: Anurag Prakash Ray

quote: Individuals with growth mind-set, who believe that intelligence and talents can be enhanced through effort, regard mistakes as opportunities to learn and improve. By contrast, individuals with fixed mind-set, who believe that intelligence and talents are innate and unchangeable, think mistakes signal a lack of ability
author: Carol Dweck

quote: Much of what I stumbled into by following my curiosity and intuition turned out to be priceless later on.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Three failures in a row, did you not think I need to pack it in? I will never give up, I will just keep going.
author: Elon Musk

quote: If I had asked people what they wanted, they would have said faster horses.
author: Henry Ford

quote: The most basic of all human needs is the need to understand and be understood. The best way to understand people is to listen to them.
author: Ralph G. Nichols

quote: The most pathetic person in the world is someone who has sight, but has no vision.
author: Helen Keller

quote: No one is ready for a thing, until he believes he can acquire it. The state of mind must be BELIEF, not mere hope or wish.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Empathy and social skills are social intelligence, the interpersonal part of emotional intelligence.
author: Daniel Goleman

quote: It is usually best to be generous with praise and cautious with criticism.
author: Anonymous

quote: Success starts with attitude. Make sure yours is positive, expectant, upbeat, and infectious ... and pretty much at all times.
author: Honoree Corder

quote: You will never go higher than your thinking.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: People with a growth mind-set believe that they can improve with effort. They outperform those with a fixed mind-set, even when they have a lower IQ, because they embrace challenges, treating them as opportunities to learn something new.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: A man who has committed a mistake and doesn't correct it is committing another mistake.
author: Confucius

quote: Only a life lived for others is a life worthwhile.
author: Einstein

quote: Challenges in life are inevitable, but the deciding factor is how we handle setbacks and challenges. people with a growth mind-set welcome challenges and setbacks. they believe that with effort through increased learning and good strategies such as practice, perseverance, motivation they can succeed.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: If you create a vision for your life, doors will open.
author: Anonymous

quote: If each of us were to confess his most secret desire, the one that inspires all his plans, all his actions, he would say: I want to be praised.
author: E M Coran

quote: When I started counting my blessings, my whole life turned around.
author: Willie Nelson

quote: A Journey of a thousand miles must begin with a single step.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: A man is what he thinks about all day long
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Be thankful for what you have; you'll end up having more. If you concentrate on what you don't have, you will never, ever have enough.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Knowledge is of no value unless you put it into practice.
author: Anton Chekhov

quote: The only way to learn about life is by exploring. T.S. Eliot
author: Unknown

quote: You can practice to attain knowledge, but you can't practice to attain wisdom.
author: Herbie Hancock

quote: Your attitude is a better predictor of your success than your IQ.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: Life is a grindstone, and whether it grinds a man down or polishes him up depends on the stuff he's made of.
author: Josh Billings

quote: Always make a total effort, even when the odds are against you.
author: Arnold Palmer

quote: Those who enter the gates of heaven are not beings who have no passions or who have curbed the passions, but those who have cultivated an understanding of them.
author: William Blake

quote: The happiest people on earth don't have the best things in life, they just make the best of everything.
author: Anonymous

quote: Logic will get you from A-Z. Imagination will take you everywhere.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Experience is the name everyone gives to their mistakes.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Believing that all children can, with effort, persistence, and motivation succeed, is the heart of this belief.
author: M. Ricci, Mind-set in the classroom

quote: What you focus on expands, and when you focus on the goodness in your life, you create more of it. Opportunities, relationships, even money flowed my way when I learned to be grateful no matter what happened in my life.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Emotional intelligence accounts for 80 percent of career success.
author: Daniel Goleman

quote: The world around us is constantly evolving and adapting. Success isn't achieved by staying idle; you've got to adapt and overcome challenges around you.
author: Chris Quiocho

quote: Feedback can be the information that drives the formative process, or it can be a stumbling block that derails the process.
author: Brookhart

quote: A goal is a dream with a deadline.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Build me a son who will be strong enough to know when he is weak, and brave enough to face himself when he is afraid, one who will be proud and unbending in honest defeat, and humble and gentle in victory.
author: Douglas MacArthur

quote: What can any of us do with his talent but to develop his vision, so that through frequent failure we may learn better what we have missed in the past.
author: William Carlos Williams

quote: Grit is perseverance, or stick-to-it-iveness. All difficult, long-term achievements require it.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: Look deep into nature and then you will understand everything better.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: I studied the lives of great men and famous women, and I found that the men and women who got to the top were those who did the jobs they had in hand, with everything they had of energy and enthusiasm and hard work.
author: Harry S Truman

quote: I am not what happened to me, I am what I choose to become.
author: Emma Watson

quote: The only way to escape the corruptible effect of praise is to go on working.
author: Einstein

quote: I've found that nothing in life is worthwhile unless you take risks. Fall forward. Every failed experiment is one step closer to success. You've got to take risks. You will fail at some point in your life. Accept it. You will lose - You will embarrass yourself. You will suck at something. There is no doubt about it. Never be discouraged. Never look back. Give everything you've got. And when you fall throughout life, fall forward.
author: Denzel Washington, University of Pennsylvania

quote: Be ready to revise any system, scrap any method and abandon any theory, if the success of the job requires it.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Boys, this is only a game. But it's like life, in that you will be dealt some bad hands. Take each hand, good or bad, and don't whine and complain, but play it out. If you're man enough to do that, God will help and you will come out well.
author: Dwight D Eisenhower's mother

quote: You are not a failure until you start blaming others for your mistakes. Blaming, cursing, hating doesn't help you, it hurts you.
author: John Wooden, Coach, 10x National Champion

quote: Life is a series of experiences, each one of which makes us bigger, even though it is hard to realize this. For the world was built to develop character and we must learn that the setbacks and griefs which we endure help us out in marching onward.
author: Henry Ford

quote: IQ by itself is not a very good predictor of performance.
author: Hunter (1984)

quote: Watch your manner of speech if you wish to develop a peaceful state of mind. Start each day by affirming peaceful, contented and happy attitudes and your days will tend to be pleasant and successful.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: Real integrity stays in place whether the test is adversity or prosperity.
author: Charles Swindoll

quote: For every obstacle there is a solution. Persistence is the key. The greatest mistake is giving up
author: Dwight D Eisenhower

quote: The truest mark of being born with great qualities is being born without envy.
author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quote: If a man empties his purse into his head, no man can take it away from him. An investment in knowledge always pays the best interest.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Failure is that early morning hour of darkness which precedes the dawning of the day of success.
author: Leigh Mitchell Hodges

quote: It is much more valuable to look for the strength in others. You can gain nothing by criticizing their imperfections.
author: Daisaku Ikeda

quote: If you don't have a vision you're going to be stuck in what you know. And the only thing you know is what you've already seen.
author: Iyanla Vanzant

quote: A half-truth is a whole lie.
author: Yiddish Proverb

quote: You are your greatest asset. Put your time, effort and money into training, grooming, and encouraging your greatest asset.
author: Tom Hopkins

quote: Read 500 pages like this every week. That's how knowledge builds up, like compound interest.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: The one thing that matters is the effort.
author: Antoine de Saint Exupery

quote: Failures can be a powerful way to learn and ironically provide the means for life's greatest breakthroughs and successes.
author: C. Manz

quote: Integrity is not a conditional word. It doesn't blow in the wind or change with the weather. It is your inner image of yourself, and if you look in there and see a man who won't cheat, then you know he never will.
author: John D. MacDonald

quote: He who smiles rather than rages is always the stronger.
author: Japanese proverb

quote: We all know that criticism can sometimes be hard to take, but we also learn very early on that it usually makes for a stronger and better business.
author: Jet Blue

quote: Even if you're on the right track, you'll get run over if you just sit there.
author: Will Rogers

quote: A goal with no plan is just a wish.
author: Anonymous

quote: Whenever it is possible, a boy should choose some occupation which he should do even if he did not need the money
author: William Lyon Phelps

quote: Progress is born of doubt and inquiry.
author: Robert G. Ingersoll

quote: The highest reward for man's toil is not what he gets for it, but wat he becomes by it.
author: John Ruskin

quote: Self-belief: I am the greatest, I said that even before I knew I was.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: I knew enough medicine and physiology to know it wasn't a physical barrier, but I think it had become a psychological barrier. My attitude was that it can be done, and it will be done soon, and I'd rather it were done here. I thought it would be right for Britain to try to get this.
author: Roger Bannister on breaking the 4-minutes mile the first time.

quote: Practice isn't the thing you do once you're good. It's the thing you do that makes you good.
author: Malcolm Gladwell author and sociologist

quote: There is nothing quite so tragic as a young cynic, because it means the person has gone from knowing nothing to believing nothing.
author: Maya Angelou, contemplating courage in the face of evil

quote: Intelligence is the aggregate or global capacity of the individual to act purposefully, to think rationally and to deal effectively with his environment reflects this broader view
author: Wechsler
