quote: Focusing solely on what you can potentially do better than any other organization is the only path to greatness.
author: Jim Collins

quote: Discontent is the first step in progress. No one knows what is in him till he tries, and many would never try if they were not forced to.
author: Basil Maturin

quote: The winner's edge is not in a gifted birth, a high IQ, or in talent. The winner's edge is all in the attitude, not aptitude. Attitude is the criterion for success.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: He that lives well, is learned enough.
author: Benjamin Franklin, 1736

quote: Humility must accompany all our actions, must be with us everywhere; for as soon as we glory in our good works they are of no further value to our advancement in virtue.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: He that can have patience can have what he will.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: No one can arrive from being talented alone, work transforms talent into genius.
author: Anna Pavlova

quote: Curiosity is one of the permanent and certain characteristics of a vigorous mind.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: Silver is purified in fire and so are we.' It is in the most trying times that our real character is shaped and revealed.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Success is getting or achieving wealth, respect, or fame.
author: Webster dictionary

quote: If I had asked people what they wanted, they would have said faster horses
author: Henry Ford

quote: That which does not kill me makes me stronger.
author: Friedrich Nietzche

quote: Excellence is not a skill. It is an attitude.
author: Unknown

quote: Failure is success if we learn from it.
author: Malcolm Forbes

quote: You have to be fast on your feet and adaptive or else a strategy is useless.
author: Charles de Gaulle

quote: Failure is not the opposite of success; it's part of success.
author: Arianna Huffington

quote: The rewards for those who persevere far exceed the pain that must precede the victory.
author: Ted Engstrom

quote: Problems then become merely challenging opportunities that we can turn to our advantage. They provide opportunities for personal growth and can stimulate our creativity for finding better ways to live.
author: C. Manz

quote: And the most successful people are those who accept, and adapt to constant change. This adaptability requires a degree of flexibility and humility most people can't manage.
author: Paul Lutus

quote: I am indebted to my father for living, but to my teacher for living well.
author: Alexander the Great

quote: Goals enable you to do more for yourself and others, too.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: We awaken in others the same attitude of mind we hold toward them.
author: Elbert Hubaard

quote: Our attitude creates our lives
author: Anonymous

quote: For I go about doing nothing else than urging you, young and old, not to care for your persons or your property more than for the perfection of your souls, or even so much; and I tell you that virtue does not come from money, but from virtue comes money and all other good things to man, both the individual and to the state.
author: Socrates

quote: Example is the school of mankind, and they will learn at no other.
author: Burke

quote: Talent is a gift, but character is a choice.
author: John C Maxwell

quote: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Every healthy child is a potential genius, but whether they become so or not depends on circumstances, on education, and on themselves.
author: Polgar

quote: This kind of obsessive preparation does two things. It creates consistency. Practice is what enables Greg Rusedski to hit a serve at a hundred and twenty-five miles per hour again and again. It's what enables a pianist to play Chopin's double-thirds 'tude at full speed, striking every key with precisely calibrated force. More important, practice changes the way a task is perceived.
author: Malcolm Gladwell

quote: People with fixed mind-set: they feel threatened by the success of others as a result, they may plateau early and achieve less than their full potential all this confirm a deterministic view of the world.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: Patience is not only a virtue, but an acquired trait.
author: Christian Calhoun

quote: It's also about attitudes and beliefs
author: Michelle Obama

quote: The illiterate of the 21st century will not be those who cannot read and write, but those who cannot learn, unlearn, and relearn.
author: Alvin Toffler

quote: Energy, Intelligence and Integrity are the key criteria for success.
author: Conor Neill

quote: Never be limited by other people's limited imaginations.
author: Mae Jemison

quote: Coming together is a beginning; keeping together is progress; working together is success.
author: Henry Ford

quote: If ' you can't be a good example, then you'll just have to be a horrible warning.
author: Catherine Aird

quote: It is your attitude, more than your aptitude that will determine your altitude.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: A dream becomes a goal when action is taken toward its achievement.
author: Bo Bennett

quote: When you improve a little each day, eventually big things occur. When you improve conditioning a little each day, eventually you have a big improvement in conditioning. Not tomorrow, not the next day, but eventually a big gain is made. Don't look for the big, quick improvement. Seek the small improvement one day at a time. That's the only way it happens
author: and when it happens, it lasts.

quote: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: There is one quality which one must possess to win, and that is definiteness of purpose, the knowledge of what one wants, and a burning desire to possess it.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: In your patience ye are strong.
author: Lizabeth Barrett Browning

quote: When you are not afraid to fail, you're well on the way to success.
author: Jeffrey Keller

quote: A curious state of mind improves learning and memory
author: Neuron (Journal)

quote: We tend to forget that happiness doesn't come as a result of getting something we don't have, but rather of recognizing and appreciating what we do have.
author: Fredrick Koenig

quote: You can stumble and fall, make errors and mistakes, but you are not a failure until you start blaming others, including fate, for your results. Always believe there is a positive to be found in the negative. Things usually happen for a reason, even when you are unable to discern the reason. Remember, there is a special providence even in the fall of a sparrow.
author: John Wooden, Coach, 10x National Champion

quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
author: Alan Kay

quote: If your actions inspire others to dream more, learn more, do more and become more, you are a leader.
author: John Quincy Adams

quote: The qualities of a great man are vision, integrity, courage, understanding, the power of articulation, and profundity of character.
author: Dwight D Eisenhower

quote: Great leaders inspire greatness in others.
author: Unknown

quote: A successful man is one who can lay a firm foundation with the bricks others have thrown at him.
author: David Brinkley

quote: Alexander the Great received continuous feedback from his mentor Aristotle
author: Unknown

quote: To the one who offered it, I decline to accept your abuse and request you to keep it for yourself.
author: Buddha

quote: Could we change our attitude, we should not only see life differently, but life itself would come to be different. Life would undergo a change of appearance because we ourselves had undergone a change in attitude.
author: Katherine Mansfield

quote: Character is doing the right thing when nobody's looking.
author: J.C. Watts

quote: Ambition is the path to success. Persistence is the vehicle you arrive in.
author: Anonymous

quote: We all need people who will give us feedback. That's how we improve.
author: Bill Gates

quote: Talent alone is not the only trait that makes us successful
author: Unknown

quote: There is no defence against criticism except obscurity.
author: Joseph Addison

quote: Self-praise is for losers. Be a winner. Stand for something. Always have class, and be humble.
author: John Madden

quote: Talent is not merit, but a gift.
author: Manfred von Ardenne

quote: Timing, perseverance, and ten years of trying will eventually make you look like an overnight success.
author: Biz Stone, Twitter co-founder

quote: It's not about talent once you get to the NFL because everyone's got it. It's about being willing to go that extra mile to be the best and that's something that I've always done.
author: Robert Griffin III

quote: It is better to deserve honours and not have them than to have them and not deserve them.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Envy shoots at others and wounds itself.
author: English Proverb

quote: Mankind, by the perverse depravity of their nature, esteem that which they have most desired as of no value the moment it is possessed, and torment themselves with fruitless wishes for that which is beyond their reach.
author: Francois de Fenelon

quote: Character is the foundation stone upon which one must build to win respect. Just as no worthy building can be erected on a weak foundation, so no lasting reputation worthy of respect can be built on a weak character.
author: R. C. Samsel

quote: Failure is instructive. The person who really thinks learns quite as much from his failures as from his successes.
author: John Dewey

quote: Talent is a gift which God has given us secretly, and which we reveal without perceiving it.
author: Charles de Montesquieu

quote: When you are grateful, fear disappears and abundance appears.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: Effort the one thing within your power
author: Unknown

quote: The remarkable thing is, we have a choice every day regarding the attitude we will embrace for that day. We cannot change our past. we cannot change the fact that people will act in a certain way. We cannot change the inevitable. The only thing we can do is play on the one string we have, and that is our attitude. I am convinced that life is 10 percent what happens to me and 90 percent of how I react it. And so it'is with you... we are in charge of our Attitudes.
author: Charles Swindoll

quote: Dwell on the beauty of life. Watch the stars, and see yourself running with them.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: No matter what your current condition, how or where you grew up, or what education or training you feel you lack, you can be successful in your chosen endeavour. It is spirit, fortitude, and hardiness that matter more than where you start.
author: Jack Ma

quote: The most important key to success is how we handle setbacks and challenges
author: Unknown

quote: Instead of succumbing to their fear of looking stupid, truly exceptional people just ask the questions on their mind, because they would rather learn something new than appear smart.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: Success is about being your best self, not about being better than others.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: Keep your thoughts positive because your thoughts become your words. Keep your words positive because your words become your behaviour. Keep your behaviour positive because your behaviour becomes your habits. Keep your habits positive because your habits become your values. Keep your values positive because your values become your destiny.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

topic: Not all practice leads to success
quote: Practice makes you perfect at whatever you practice. So if you practice the wrong thing, if you practice bad habits, you will become perfect at consistently repeating those flawed skills.
author: Mathew Syed

quote: Patience is the best remedy for every trouble.
author: Plautus

quote: Strange is our situation here on Earth. Each of us comes for a short visit, not knowing why, yet sometimes seeming to divine a purpose. . . .There is one thing we do know: that man is here for the sake of other men.
author: Einstein

quote: Practice makes an actor excel. It is like cycling and motor driving. It is an art, which can be learnt and practiced.
author: Anupam Kher

quote: You should set goals beyond your reach so you always have something to live for.
author: Ted Turner

quote: Adaptability is being able to adjust to any situation at any given time.
author: John Wooden, Coach, 10x National Champion

quote: The power to question is the basis of all human progress.
author: Indira Gandhi

quote: Create'your own definition of success and'you'll be less threatened by people who are striving to reach their goals.
author: Amy Morin

quote: Never react emotionally to criticism. Analyze yourself to determine whether it is justified. If it is, correct yourself. Otherwise, go on about your business.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: Making your mark on the world is hard. If it were easy, everybody would do it. But it's not. It takes patience, it takes commitment, and it comes with plenty of failure along the way. The real test is not whether you avoid this failure, because you won't. It's whether you let it harden or shame you into inaction, or whether you learn from it; whether you choose to persevere.
author: Barack Obama

quote: Nothing splendid has ever been achieved except by those who dared believe that something inside of them was superior to circumstances.
author: Bruce Barton

quote: Socrates taught Plato, who taught Aristotle, who taught Alexander the Great.
author: Unknown

quote: I like criticism. It makes you strong.
author: LeBron James

quote: Hope is not a strategy.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Beginning today, treat everyone you meet as if they were going to be dead by midnight. Extend them all the care, kindness and understanding you can muster. Your life will never be the same again.
author: Og Mandino

quote: It's not that people with a growth mind-set are able to overcome their fears because they are braver than the rest of us; it's just that they know fear and anxiety are paralyzing emotions and that the best way to overcome this paralysis is to take action. People with a growth mind-set are empowered, and empowered people know that there's no such thing as a truly perfect moment to move forward. So why wait for one? Taking action turns all your worry and concern about failure into positive, focused energy.
author: Dr Travis Bradberry, author

quote: The bearing of a child takes nine months, no matter how many women are assigned.
author: Fred Brooks

quote: Quit Trying to Determine What's Fair. In fact, complaining about fairness can leave you feeling bitter. And those feelings of bitterness can become a huge stumbling block that will sabotage your efforts to reach your greatest potential.
author: Amy Morin, author

quote: How poor are they that have not patience! What wound did ever heal but by degrees?
author: William Shakespeare

quote: When you're curious you find lots of interesting things to do.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Whenever you feel like criticizing anyone'...'just remember that all the people in this world haven't had the advantages that you've had.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quote: Let us be grateful to the people who make us happy; they are the charming gardeners who make our souls blossom.
author: Marcel Proust

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston S. Churchill

quote: I would warn you that I do not attribute to nature either beauty or deformity, order or confusion. Only in relation to our imagination can things be called beautiful or ugly, well-ordered or confused.
author: Baruch Spinoza

quote: Perseverance is the chief to success; but perseverance must have some practical end, or it does not avail the man possessing it.
author: Alexander Graham Bell

quote: Just as there are no great achievements without setbacks, there are no great relationships without conflicts and problems along the way.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: Envy, if surrounded on all sides by the brightness of another's prosperity, like the scorpion confined within a circle of fire, will sting itself to death.
author: Charles Caleb Colton

quote: Having social skills means more than just being friendly ' it means being emotionally capable in any situation. It ultimately leads to success
author: Unknown

quote: Definiteness of purpose is the starting point of all achievement. Without a purpose and a plan, people drift aimlessly through life.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Don't be afraid to innovate, but at the same time don't delude yourself into thinking something is working when it is not working or fixated on a bad solution.
author: Elon Musk

quote: Criticism hurts for a reason, and the explanation lies in neuroscience
author: Mel Robbins

quote: Anyone can be angry, that is easy. But to be angry with the right person, to the right degree, at the right time, for the right purpose, and in the right way, that is not easy.
author: Aristotle

quote: The will to win, the desire to succeed, the urge to reach your full potential, these are the keys that will unlock the door to personal excellence.
author: Confucius

quote: Cultivate the habit of being grateful for every good thing that comes to you, and to give thanks continuously. And because all things have contributed to your advancement, you should include all things in your gratitude.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Failure is about not growing, not reaching for the things you value. It means you're not fulfilling your potential.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: A growth mind-set belief that cherished qualities can be developed creates a passion for learning.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: The only difference between success and failure is the ability to take action.
author: Alexander Graham Bell

quote: Do you want to be honest or dishonest if you are seeking wealth?
author: Warren buffet

quote: Effective feedback motivates, helps individual be a better version of self, helps businesses improve on performance, promotes growth and also, open up opportunities for learning and development.
author: Temitope Adelekan

quote: You need to put what you learn into practice and do it over and over again until it's a habit. I always say, Seeing is not believing. Doing is believing. There is a lot to learn about fitness, nutrition and emotions, but once you do, you can master them instead of them mastering you.
author: Brett Hoebel

quote: Failure I can live with. Not trying is what I can't handle.
author: Sanya Richards-Ross

quote: If you want to turn a vision into reality, you have to give 100% and never stop believing in your dream.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: The longer we dwell on our misfortunes, the greater is their power to harm us.
author: Voltaire

quote: Questioning is a powerful tool for unlocking value in companies: It spurs learning and the exchange of ideas, it fuels innovation and better performance, and it builds trust among team members. And it can mitigate business risk by uncovering unforeseen pitfalls and hazards
author: Alison Wood Brooks, Leslie K John, The Surprising Power of Questions

quote: Books allow you to fully explore a topic and immerse yourself in a deeper way than most media today.
author: Mark Zuckerberg

quote: Action is the foundational key to all success.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Mind-set is what sets apart successful people from those who are unsuccessful.
author: Siebold, author How Rich People Think

quote: Curiosity is the engine of achievement.
author: Ken Robinson

quote: The superior man blames himself. The inferior man blames others.
author: Don Shula, Head Coach, Baltimore Colts

quote: Stay hungry. Stay foolish.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: We become what we think about.
author: Earl Nightingale

quote: I would like to be remembered as someone who did the best she could with the talent she had.
author: J. K. Rowling

quote: There are many aspects to success; material wealth is only one component. Moreover success is a journey not a destination. Material abundance, in all its expressions, happens to be one of those things that makes the journey more enjoyable. But success also includes good health, energy and enthusiasm for life, fulfilling relationships, creative freedom, emotional and psychological stability, a sense of well-being, and peace of mind.
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: Curiosity is a willing, a proud, and eager confession of ignorance.
author: S.Leonard Rubinstein

quote: Genius without education is like silver in the mine.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Humility isn't denying your strengths; it's being honest about your weaknesses.
author: Rick Warren

quote: If you can imagine it. You can achieve it. If you can dream it, you can become it.
author: William Ward

quote: Human behaviour flows from three main sources: desire, emotion, and knowledge.
author: Plato

quote: If you serve an ungrateful master serve him the more. Put God in your debt. Every stroke shall be repaid. The longer the payment is withheld, the better for you, for compound interest on compound interest is the rate and usage of this exchequer.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: If you want to succeed at any job, make yourself invaluable. Go the extra mile; make them never be able to imagine what life without you there would be like.
author: Ross Mathews

quote: How do I define success? Let me tell you, money's pretty nice. But having a lot of money does not automatically make you a successful person. What you want is money and meaning. You want your work to be meaningful, because meaning is what brings the real richness to your life.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: I might not be more skilled than other Scientists & Technologists, but I have the persistence of a mule.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Criticism may not be agreeable, but it is necessary. It fulfils the same function as pain in the human body. It calls attention to an unhealthy state of things.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Curiosity is the fuel for discovery, inquiry, and learning.
author: Anonymous

quote: Do you wish to ascend? Start by going down. Do you want to build a tower reaching up to the heavens? Try building down the groundwork for humility.
author: Anonymous

quote: You can start right where you stand and apply the habit of going the extra mile by rendering more service and better service than you are now being paid for.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: People with fixed mind-set see effort as fruitless and futile
author: Carol Dweck

quote: As a man thinketh in his heart, so is he
author: Proverbs 23:7

quote: Perseverance and failure cannot coexist. Failure happens when you quit. When all is said and done, perseverance, commonly referred to as stick-to-itiveness, is the ultimate success insurance. Nothing can take its place.
author: Charles Schulz

quote: Nothing in this world is worth having or worth doing unless it means effort, pain and difficulty.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: In order to carry a positive action we must develop here a positive vision.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Being the richest man in the cemetery doesn't matter to me. Going to bed at night saying we've done something wonderful, that's what matters to me.
author: Steve Jobs.

quote: There is something I call social intelligence. You can do a lot in life on your own and you can do all kinds of stuff, but if you're really bad with people, if you're really naive or aggressive and push people away, if you don't know the political environment you're in, it invalidates all the things you know. You're not going to get anywhere.
author: Robert Greene

quote: Research has shown that it takes 31 days of conscious effort to make or break a habit. That means, if one practices something consistently for 31 days, on the 32nd day it does become a habit. Information has been internalised into behavioural change, which is called transformation.
author: Shiv Khera

quote: Gratitude can transform common days into thanksgivings, turn routine jobs into joy, and change ordinary opportunities into blessings.
author: William Arthur Ward

quote: Today's patience can transform yesterday's discouragements into tomorrow's discoveries.
author: William Arthur Ward

quote: Every defeat, every heartbreak, every loss, contains its own seed, its own lesson on how to improve your performance the next time.
author: Og Mandino

quote: It is today that we must create the world of the future.
author: Spinoza

quote: The longer I live, the more I realize the impact of attitude on life. Attitude, to me, is more important than facts. It is more important than the past, than education, than money, than circumstances, than failures, than successes, than what other people think or say or do. It is more important than appearance, giftedness or skill. It will make or break a company, a church, or a home.
author: Unknown

quote: Responding appropriately when things go wrong-turning a failure into a good failure, one from which we learn is key to success in life.
author: T. R. Hoerr

quote: You need more than traits or talent to succeed
author: Unknown

quote: We all hit moments when we feel helpless. The test is how we react to that feeling. We can either learn from it and move forward or let it drag us down. There are countless successful people who would have never made it if they had succumbed to feelings of helplessness.
author: Dr Travis Bradberry

quote: What differentiates the success stories from the failures is that the successful entrepreneurs had the foresight, the ability and the tools to discover which parts of their plans were working brilliantly and which were misguided, and adapt their strategies accordingly.
author: Eric Ries, The Lean Start-up

quote: Being challenged in life is inevitable, being defeated is optional.
author: Roger Crawford

quote: We should certainly count our blessings, but we should also make our blessings count.
author: Neal A. Maxwell

quote: Set daily, monthly, and long-term goals and dreams. Don't ever be afraid to dream too big. Nothing is impossible. If you believe in yourself, you can achieve it.
author: Nastia Liukin

quote: Be desperate to learn everything about business and hang around those who know better than you.
author: Sam Walton 'Walmart

quote: Learn from yesterday, live for today, hope for tomorrow. The important thing is not to stop questioning.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The Only Limit To Our Realization Of Tomorrow Will Be Our Doubts Of Today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: Everything perfect doesn't exist. Human beings can't accomplish this because it simply was not intended to be completed here. Here is an opportunity to learn.
author: Pope Francis

quote: Success is a sum of small efforts made each day and often takes years to achieve, it is not a sudden mammoth of event.
author: Unknown

quote: The reasonable man adapts himself to the world; the unreasonable one persists in trying to adapt the world to himself. Therefore all progress depends on the unreasonable man.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Starting out to make money is the greatest mistake in life. Do what you feel you have a flair for doing; and if you are good enough at it, the money will come.
author: Greer Garson

quote: The most confident critics are generally those who know the least about the matter criticized.
author: Ulysses S Grant

quote: Develop an attitude of gratitude, and give thanks for everything that happens to you, knowing that every step forward is a step toward achieving something bigger and better than your current situation.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: None is more impoverished than the one who has no gratitude. Gratitude is a currency that we can mint for ourselves, and spend without fear of bankruptcy.
author: Fred De Witt Van Amburgh

quote: It's not what happens to you, but what you do about it that makes the difference.
author: W Mitchell

quote: If you are afraid of confrontation, you are not going to do very well.
author: Bill Parcells, Head Coach, New York Giants

quote: Grit is your ability to'pursue your goals'with passion and perseverance as if they are a marathon, not a sprint.
author: Angela Duckworth

quote: When fate hands you a lemon make a lemonade.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: If your desires be endless, your cares and fears will be so too.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: Praising children's intelligence harms their motivation and it harms their performance. Praise that acknowledges process related activities such as practice, study, persistence and good strategies are proven to instil and develop a growth mind-set.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: Grit gives us resilience. It not only keeps us focused on a task but also enables us to persevere when we fail.
author: T. R. Hoerr

quote: People with a growth mind-set welcome challenges and setbacks. They believe that with effort through increased learning and good strategies such as practice, perseverance, motivation they can succeed.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: Vision is the art of seeing what is invisible to others.
author: Jonathan Swift

quote: Ask for feedback from people from diverse backgrounds. Each one will tell you one useful thing. If you're at the top of the chain, sometimes people won't give you honest feedback because they're afraid. In this case, disguise yourself, or get feedback from other sources.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Our greatest glory is not in never failing, but rising every time we fail.
author: Confucius

quote: In order to carry a positive action, we must develop here a positive vision.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Whatever you can do, or dream you can, begin it.' Boldness has genius, power and magic in it.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: If you believe success is simply making (or having) a lot of money, you may be setting yourself up for failure.
author: Geoffrey James

quote: I'm convinced that about half of what separates the successful entrepreneurs from the non-successful ones is pure perseverance.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Discover what motivates you, what incites you to take action to change your life. Basic motives include love, self-preservation, anger, financial gain and fear. Self-motivation requires enthusiasm, a positive outlook, a belief in yourself and your God-given potential.
author: Keith Harrell

quote: When we speak evil of others, we generally condemn ourselves.
author: Publius Syrus

quote: I must seek in the stars that which was denied to me on earth.
author: Einstein - to sons Hans Albert and Eduard, November 24, 1923

quote: Making life multi-planetary.
author: Elon Musk's vision for Spacex

quote: Instead of hiding from failure, insanely successful people anticipate and integrate failure into their lives in ways that transform it from an end into a means.
author: Eric Ries, The Lean Start-up

quote: Curiosity is the lust of the mind.
author: Thomas Hobbes

quote: Honesty is the best policy. If I lose mine honour, I lose myself.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Persistence is more valuable than planning, IQ, knowledge, genius, and talent.
author: Anonymous

quote: People with a growth mind-set welcome challenge.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: It is human to err, but it is devilish to remain willfully in error.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: None are as empty as those who are full of themselves.
author: Benjamin Whichcote

quote: People are always blaming their circumstances for what they are. I don't believe in circumstances. The people who get on in the world are the people who get up and look for the circumstances they want and if they can't find them, make them.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: The empires of the future are empires of the mind.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: The Attitude of people with fixed mind-set: Success is about establishing their superiority, pure and simple. Being that somebody who is worthier than the nobodies.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: Would you like me to give you a formula for success? It is quite simple. Double your rate of failure.
author: Thomas J Watson

quote: The purpose of life is to contribute in some way to making things better.
author: Robert F. Kennedy

quote: What is required is ten thousand hours of purposeful practice. And for practice to be truly purposeful, concentration and dedication, although important, are not sufficient. You also need to have access to the right training system, and that sometimes means living in the right town or having the right coach.
author: Mathew Syed

quote: I really had a lot of dreams when I was a kid, and I think a great deal of that grew out of the fact that I had a chance to read a lot.
author: Bill Gates

quote: Keep your eyes on your own path. Every minute you spend thinking about other people reaching their dreams is a minute you didn't spend working on achieving your own.
author: Amy Morin, author

quote: Human development is about progressively seeing more
author: Unknown

quote: A man without a goal is like a ship without a rudder.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: Learning is not attained by chance, it must be sought for with ardour and diligence
author: Abigail Adams

quote: What you believe affects what you achieve.
author: Bill Gates

quote: No matter what happens, you still have a choice about how to respond.
author: Condoleezza Rice

quote: A man's wishes and prayers are only gratified and answered when they harmonize with his thoughts and actions.
author: James Allen

quote: Take heed you harbour not that vice called Envy, lest another's happiness be your torment, and God's blessing become your curse.
author: Wellins Calcott

quote: By failing to prepare, you ae preparing to fail.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: The strongest of all warriors are these two-Time and Patience.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: But 'well' for different people means different things. The person may not be in college, but is doing the best he or she can to fulfil their potential, to help their family.
author: Tyrone McGraw

quote: As often as you fail, get up and try again. God will never let you down, so long as you don't let Him down, and so long as you make the effort.
author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quote: Everyone who has achieved exceptional performance has encountered terrible difficulties along the way. There are no exceptions. If you believe that doing the right kind of work can overcome the problems, then you have at least a chance of moving on to ever better performance. But those who see the setbacks as evidence that they lack the necessary gift will give up'quite logically, in light of their beliefs. They will never achieve what they might have.
author: Geoff Colvin

quote: Success is peace of mind attained only through'self-satisfaction in knowing you made the effort to do the best'of which you're capable. I believe that's true. If you make the effort to do the best of which you're capable, to try and improve the situation that exists for you, I think that's success.
author: John Wooden, Coach, 10x National Champion

quote: Attitude is a little thing that makes a big difference.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Faced with the choice between changing one's mind and proving that there is no need to do so, almost everyone gets busy on the proof.
author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quote: Research is formalized curiosity. It is poking and prying with a purpose.
author: Zora Neale Hurston

quote: The discipline of gratitude is the explicit effort to acknowledge that all I am and have is given to me as a gift of love, a gift to be celebrated with joy.
author: Henri Nouwen

quote: Creativity grows out of two things: curiosity and imagination.
author: Benny Goodman

quote: I will act now. I will act now. I will act now. Henceforth, I will repeat these words each hour, each day, everyday, until the words become as much a habit as my breathing, and the action which follows become as instinctive as the blinking of my eyelids. With these words I can condition my mind to perform every action necessary for my success.  I will act now. I will repeat these words again and again and again. I will walk where failures fear to work. I will work when failures seek rest, I will act now for now is all I have. I am not a failure. I will act now. Success will not wait. If I delay, success will become wed to another and lost to me forever. This is the time. This is the place. I am the person.
author: Og Mandino

quote: When one door of happiness closes, another opens; but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one which has been opened for us.
author: Helen Keller

quote: I have the highest goals for myself. That's going out there and being the best player on the floor every time. That's my mentality.
author: Zach LaVine

quote: It's not what happens to you; it's what you do about it that makes the difference.
author: W. Mitchell

quote: A good decision is based on knowledge and not on numbers.
author: Plato

quote: Success isn't about the end result, it's about what you learn along the way.
author: Vera Wang

quote: Practice makes any task easier
author: Unknown

quote: Our patience will achieve more than our force.
author: Edmund Burke

quote: It's not that I'm so smart, it's just that I stay with problems longer.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Many a man curses the rain that falls upon his head, and knows not that it brings abundance to drive away hunger.
author: Saint Basil

quote: Don't wait for extraordinary opportunities. Seize common occasions and make them great. Weak men wait for opportunities, strong men make them.
author: Orison Swett Marden

quote: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
author: Thomas Edison

quote: Many people with IQs of 160 work for people with IQs of 100, if the former have poor intrapersonal intelligence and the latter have a high one.
author: Daniel Goleman, Emotional Intelligence

quote: Talent without effort is wasted talent. And while effort is the one thing you can control in your life, applying that effort intelligently is important.
author: Mark Cuban

quote: Being humble means that we are not on earth to see how important we can become, but to see how much difference we can make in the lives of others.
author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quote: You are what you repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
author: Aristotle

quote: You are what you are and you are where you are because of what has gone into your mind. You can change what you are and change where you are by changing what goes into your mind.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: The Universe will conspire to help you when you commit to following your purpose.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: Much effort, much prosperity.
author: Euripides

quote: People with goals succeed because they know where they're going.
author: Earl Nightingale

quote: One must not lose desires. They are mighty stimulants to creativeness, to love and to long life.
author: Alexander Bogomoletz

quote: I want to define success by redefining it. For me it isn't that solely mythical definition ' glamour, allure, power of wealth, and the privilege from care. Any definition of success should be personal because it's so transitory. It's about shaping my own destiny.
author: Anita Roddick

quote: Wayne Gretzky would frequently stay behind after practice, long after everyone had left, flipping pucks to a specific spot in the crease, or aiming shot after shot at the crossbar or the goal post.
author: Malcolm Gladwell

quote: Always in a moment of extreme danger things can be done which had previously been thought impossible.
author: General Erwin Rommel

quote: Nature never appeals to intelligence until habit and instinct are useless. There is no intelligence where there is no change and no need of change. Only those animals partake of intelligence that have a huge variety of needs and dangers.
author: H.G. Wells

quote: Analyses of others are actually expressions of our own needs and values.
author: Marshall Rosenberg

quote: Adversity brings out our hidden potential.
author: Jeff Keller

quote: If you believe that if you do the work, properly designed, with intense focus for hours a day and years on end, your performance will grow dramatically better and eventually reach the highest levels, there's at least a chance you will do the work and achieve great performance.
author: Geoff Colvin

quote: The mode by which the inevitable is reached is effort.
author: Felix Frankfurter

quote: The practice of patience toward one another, the overlooking of one another's defects, and the bearing of one another's burdens is the most elementary condition of all human and social activity in the family, in the professions, and in society.
author: Lawrence G. Lovasik

quote: Your success will shine as a light of hope and inspire numbers you cannot total.
author: Mary Anne Radmacher

quote: Practical thinking skills include applying, using, utilizing and practicing.
author: Sternberg.

quote: Never attack the person. Criticize the action.
author: Mel Robbins

quote: If you haven't failed at least three times today you haven't tried anything new.
author: Carole Hyatt

quote: Everyone who has achieved exceptional performance has encountered terrible difficulties along the way. There are no exceptions.
author: Geoff Colvin

quote: All growth depends upon activity. There is no development physically or intellectually without effort, and effort means work.
author: Calvin Coolidge

quote: Is it ability, or mind-set, determination to work hard? Was it Mozart's musical ability or the fact that he worked till his hands were deformed? Was it Darwin's scientific ability or the fact that he collected specimens nonstop from early childhood?
author: Carol Dweck

quote: People with growth mind-set find lessons and inspiration in the success of others as a result, they reach ever higher levels of achievement. All this gives them a greater sense of free will.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: Understand that real wealth is portable; it's knowledge.
author: Steven Siliger

quote: Intelligence and personality can be developed rather than being immutably engrained traits.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: Every adversity carries with it the seed of an equivalent or greater benefit.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: The gift of fantasy has meant more to me than my talent for absorbing positive knowledge.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: There is nothing either good or bad, but thinking makes it so.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Perseverance is about learning something over time: confronting a challenge and making progress.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: Our envy of others devours us most of all.
author: Alexander Solzhenitsyn

quote: The mark of a champion is the ability to win when things are not quite right.
author: Billie Jean King

quote: Genius is patience.
author: Isaac Newton

quote: The life of the individual has meaning only insofar as it aids in making the life of every living thing nobler and more beautiful. Life is sacred, that is to say, it is the supreme value, to which all other values are subordinate.
author: Einstein

quote: I do not believe in genius, only persistent courageous labour.
author: M. Reger

quote: Nothing can stop the man with the right mental attitude from achieving his goal; nothing can help the man with the wrong mental attitude.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Mishaps are like knives that either serve us or cut us as we grasp them by the blade or the handle.
author: James Russell Lowell

quote: To err is human, to forgive divine.
author: Alexander Pope

quote: It takes about ten years to make a mature dancer. Dancing appears glamorous, easy, delightful, but the path to the paradise of that achievement is not easier than any other. There is fatigue so great that the body cries even in its sleep. There are times of complete frustration
author: Martha Graham

quote: What did I (or can I) learn from that experience? How can I use it as a basis for growth?
author: Carol Dweck, 2006

quote: If you can find ways without any obstacles, it probably leads nowhere.
author: Che Guevara

quote: You have to apply yourself each day to becoming a little better. By applying yourself to the task of becoming a little better each and every day over a period of time, you will become a lot better.
author: Carol Dweck,

quote: The fellow who never makes a mistake takes his orders from one who does.
author: Herbert B Prochow

quote: No one can defeat us unless we first defeat ourselves.
author: Dwight D Eisenhower

quote: We forget that every good that is worth possessing must be paid for in strokes of daily effort.
author: William James

quote: Smart decision-making requires more than the intellect as measured by traditional IQ.
author: Daniel Goleman

quote: Curiosity is as much the parent of attention, as attention is of memory.
author: Richard Whately

quote: The most important thing in the life of every man and every woman is not that they should never fall along the way. The important thing is always to get back up, not to stay on the ground licking your wounds.
author: Pope Francis, The name of God is Mercy

quote: You were born to win, but to be a winner, you must plan to win, prepare to win, and expect to win.
author: Zig Zigglar

quote: I have no special talents. I am only passionately curious.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Most of the important things in the world have been accomplished by people who have kept on trying when there seemed to be no hope at all.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: Hardship is a blessing when it spurs effort and development; ease is a curse when it increases complacency and self-indulgence.
author: Muso Kokushi

quote: The price of success is hard work, dedication to the job at hand, and the determination that whether we win or lose, we have applied the best of ourselves to the task at hand.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: I am absolutely convinced that no wealth in the world can help humanity forward, even in the hands of the most devoted worker. The example of great and pure individuals is the only thing that can lead us to noble thoughts and deeds. Money only appeals to selfishness and irresistibly invites abuse. Can anyone imagine Moses, Jesus or Gandhi armed with the moneybags of Carnegie?
author: Albert Einstein

quote: From the errors of others, a wise man corrects his own.
author: Publilius Syrus

quote: Attitude is everything.
author: Anonymous

quote: Somewhere a noble failure serves the world as faithfully as a distinguished success.
author: Dowden

quote: There's a lot of intelligence out there being wasted by underestimating students' potential to develop.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: True innovation is created by singularly gifted visionaries who ignore customer input and instead manufacture innovation based solely on their prophetic vision for a better future.
author: Unknown

quote: To be strategic is to concentrate on what is important, on those few objectives that can give us a comparative advantage, on what is important to us rather than others, and to plan and execute the resulting plan with determination and steadfastness.
author: Richard Koch

quote: To be smart is to learn and to increase one's intellectual skills.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: Optimism is faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Genius is eternal patience.
author: Michelangelo

quote: The world is filled with an abundance of opportunity which the dreamers of the past never knew.
author: Napoleon Hill.

quote: They key of persistence opens all door closed by resistance
author: John Di Lemme

quote: We don't have to be smarter than the rest; we have to be more disciplined that the rest.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Energy and persistence conquer all things.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: The trouble with most of us is that we would rather be ruined by praise than saved by criticism.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: Our capacity for success and greatness is embodied by the people we surround ourselves with, if we can't hang out with Franklin and Einstein and Tesla, why not surround ourselves with their stories?
author: Lewis Howes

quote: Goal setting is what separates successful people from unsuccessful people.
author: Claudiu Molovan

quote: Don't complain when things don't go your way. Complaining is an obvious sign of a fixed mindset.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: I will lived useful, rather than, died rich.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Gratitude is the ability to experience life as a gift. It liberates us from the prison of self-preoccupation.
author: John Ortberg

quote: People with growth mind-set learn from criticism, people with a fixed mind-set ignore useful negative feedback
author: Carol Dweck

quote: Success seems to be connected with action. Successful people keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don't quit.
author: Conrad Hilton

quote: The sign of an intelligent person is his ability to control emotions by the application of reason.
author: Marya Mannes

quote: Albert Camus, Nobel prize winner: Inspired by his teacher
author: Unknown

quote: Pride is about my glory; humility is about God's glory.
author: Ephesians

quote: If seeds in the black earth can turn into such beautiful roses, what might not the heart of man become in its long journey toward the stars?
author: G. K Chesterton

quote: Feel the fear and do it anyway.
author: Susan Jeffers

quote: The first step towards getting somewhere is to decide that you are not going to stay where you are.
author: J.P. Morgan

quote: Whatever is begun in anger, ends in shame.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: We're in a world now where it's not enough to be smart. You have to be curious.
author: Barry Charles Diller, Fox Broadcasting Company

quote: Every child is a promise.
author: Laszlo Polgar

quote: You can only become truly accomplished at something you love. Don't make money your goal. Instead, pursue the things you love doing, and then do them so well that people can't take their eyes off you.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Real success is reflected in your mind-set: your readiness to grow.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: A creative life cannot be sustained by approval any more than it can be destroyed by criticism.
author: Will Self

quote: We can't solve our problems from the same level of thinking that created them. Human development is about progressively seeing more.
author: Unknown

quote: Our envy always lasts longer than the happiness of those we envy.
author: Fran'ois de la Rochefoucauld

quote: Criticism is information that will help you grow.
author: Hendrie Weisinger

quote: Create a vision for the life you really want and then work relentlessly towards making it a reality.
author: Roy Bennett

quote: The public have an insatiable curiosity to know everything, except what is worth knowing.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Those who are blessed with the most talent don't necessarily outperform everyone else. It's the people who follow-through who excel.
author: Mary Kay Ash

quote: Reflect upon your present blessings, of which everyone has plenty; not on your past misfortunes, of which all men have some.
author: Charles Dickens

quote: When you have a great and difficult task, something perhaps almost impossible, if you only work a little at a time, every day a little, suddenly the work will finish itself.
author: Isak Dinesen

quote: Joy is the simplest form of gratitude.
author: Karl Barth

quote: The growth mind-set says all of these things can be developed. All - you, your partner, and the relationship - are capable of growth and change. In the fixed mind-set, the ideal is instant, perfect, and perpetual compatibility. Like it was meant to be. Like riding off into the sunset. Like they lived happily ever after.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: Everyone has a role model, someone who pointed the way at a critical moment in their lives.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: Super-successful people know more than others do because they're constantly working to increase their self-awareness.
author: Travis Bradberry

quote: Ingratitude is monstrous.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: What keeps me going is goals.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: If you can't fly then run, if you can't run then walk, if you can't walk then crawl, but whatever you do, you have to keep moving forward.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: Glory is sometimes born of catastrophe.
author: National Review

quote: Practice enables people to perceive more, to know more, and to remember more than most people.
author: Mathew Syed

quote: The value of failure is in the learning and growth that it provides. Without learning and growth, failure can be a destructive force in our lives.
author: C. Manz

quote: The roots of all goodness lie in the soil of appreciation for goodness.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Intelligence is hitting a target that nobody else can. Genius is hitting a target that nobody else can see.
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: If we fail to define success for ourselves and try to pursue someone's path, we will end up frustrated, unhappy, unhappy and ultimately feeling deeply unsuccessful.
author: www.success.com

quote: Perseverance is a great element of success. If you only knock long enough and loud enough at the gate, you are sure to wake up somebody.
author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow.

quote: In our study, we taught them that every time the children push out of their comfort zone to learn something new and difficult, the neurons in their brain can form new, stronger connections, and over time they can get smarter.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: My dad was my best friend and greatest role model. He was an amazing dad, coach, mentor, soldier, husband and friend.
author: Tiger Woods

quote: When I do good, I feel good. When I do bad, I feel bad. That's my religion.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Oh my friend, why do you, who are a citizen of the great and mighty and wise city of Athens, care so much about laying up the greatest amount of money and honour and reputation, and so little about wisdom and truth and the greatest improvement of the soul, which you never regard or heed at all? Are you not ashamed of this?
author: Socrates

quote: Who do you spend time with? Criticizers or encouragers? Surround yourself with those who believe in you. Your life is too important for anything less.
author: Steve Goodier

quote: Always render more and better service than is expected of you, no matter what your task may be.
author: Og Mandino

quote: If you're not stubborn, you'll give up on experiments too soon. And if you're not flexible, you'll pound your head against the wall and you won't see a different solution to a problem you're trying to solve.
author: Jeff Bezos

quote: To persist steadfastly in pursuit of an undertaking, task, journey, or goal, even if hindered by distraction, difficulty, obstacles, or discouragement.
author: Michael Pollock

quote: No duty is more urgent than that of returning thanks.
author: James Allen

quote: The world is not the most pleasant place. Eventually your parents leave you and nobody is going to go out of their way to protect you unconditionally. You need to learn to stand up for yourself and what you believe.
author: Queen Elizabeth II

quote: It is unwise to be too sure of one's own wisdom. It is healthy to be reminded that the strongest might weaken and the wisest might err.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: The happy people are those who are producing something.
author: William Ralph Inge

quote: It is only through labour and painful effort, by grim energy and resolute courage that we move on to better things.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: To be upset over what you don't have is to waste what you do have.
author: Ken Keyes, Jr

quote: For every disciplined effort there is a multiple reward.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Only those who dare to fail greatly can ever achieve greatly.
author: Robert Kennedy

quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Vision without execution is hallucination.
author: Thomas Edison

quote: When dealing with people, remember you are not dealing with creatures of logic, but with creatures of emotion.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: I am more and more convinced that whenever one has to vent an opinion on the actions or on the writings of others, unless this be done from a certain one-sided enthusiasm, or from a loving interest in the person and the work, the result is hardly worth gathering up. Sympathy and enjoyment in what we see is in fact the only reality, and, from such reality, reality as a natural product follows. All else is vanity.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: If you set goals and go after them with all the determination you can muster, your gifts will take you places that will amaze you.
author: Les Brown

quote: Whether you are in God's hand being used publicly or on the table in the darkness of obscurity it makes no difference to your value.
author: Ray Bevan, Pastor

quote: Thoughts are the first step for all things to be. If you believe it hard enough and work hard enough, it will become reality. Our greatest gift is the power of thought. Thoughts are pure energy that can take you to the highest of highs, or the lowest of lows.
author: Steve Rizzo

quote: Success is the child of drudgery and perseverance. It cannot be coaxed or bribed; pay the price and it is yours.
author: Orison Swett Marden

quote: Integrity is about being honest and having strong moral principles. It may also be described as the ability to act in ways that are consistent with the values, beliefs, and moral principles we hold. Integrity is about making good choices. It is doing the right things for the right reason.
author: Unknown

quote: Talent isn't enough. You need motivation and persistence, too; a blend of faith and arrogance.
author: Steinbeck

quote: Don't mind criticism. If it is untrue, disregard it; if unfair, keep from irritation; if it is ignorant, smile; if it is justified, it is not criticism, learn from it.
author: Anonymous

quote: The mind is its own place, and in itself can make a heaven of hell, a hell of haven.
author: John Milton

quote: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: No one who achieves success does so without the help of others. The wise and confident acknowledge this help with gratitude.
author: Alfred North Whitehead

quote: Just Start.
author: German proverb

quote: You must not under any pretence allow your mind to dwell on any thought that is not positive, constructive, optimistic, kind.
author: Emmet Fox

quote: Knowledge is necessary too. A child with great intuition could not grow up to become something worthwhile in life without some knowledge. However there comes a point in everyone's life where only intuition can make the leap ahead, without knowing precisely how.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Anyone can attain my level, if he is as diligent as I have been for my entire life.
author: J.S. Bach

quote: It is always the secure who are humble.
author: G.K. Chesterton

quote: Everyone can be great, because everyone can serve.
author: Martin Luther

quote: Set a goal. Write it down. Set a deadline. Make a plan. And work on becoming better in that area every single day.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: Talent without effort is wasted talent. And while effort is the one thing you can control in your life, applying that effort intelligently is what is important.
author: Mark Cuban

quote: Failure is usually the line of least persistence.
author: Wilfred Beaver

quote: Charles Dickens was lame. So was Handel. Homer was blind, Plato was a hunchback. Sir Walter Scott was paralyse. What gave each of these people the stamina to overcome their circumstances? Purpose! Each of them had a dream, fueled by a fire within that could not be extinguished.
author: Bob Gass, author

quote: Skepticism is the first step towards truth.
author: Denis Diderot

quote: To be a leader or to succeed in your business or field, you need to be able to see those circular trends long before they become conventional wisdom.
author: Sataya Nadella (CEO Microsoft).

quote: If you're curious about how and why things work, and are keen to uncover explanations, then you're more likely to succeed than your colleagues.
author: Unknown

quote: The size of your success is measured by the strength of your desire; the size of your dream; and how you handle disappointment along the way.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: I believe ability can get you to the top, but it takes character to keep you there.
author: John Wooden, Coach, 10x National Champion

quote: Whatever evil befalls us, we ought to ask ourselves.. how we can turn it into good. So shall we take occasion, from one bitter root, to raise perhaps many flowers.
author: Leigh Hunt

quote: Over time I have come to understand that extraordinary people do have extraordinary gift, which lies at the heart of their capabilities, But is not the gift that people usually assume it to be, and it is even more powerful than we imagine. Most importantly, it is a gift that every one of us is born with and can, with the right approach, take advantage of.
author: Anders Ericsson, Robert Pool, Peak

quote: A growth mind-set allows each individual to embrace learning, to welcome challenges, mistakes, and feedback, and to understand the role of effort in creating talent.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: Feedback when given well should not alienate the receiver of the feedback, but should motivate them to perform better.
author: Anonymous

quote: Jealousy in romance is like salt in food. A little can enhance the savor, but too much can spoil the pleasure and, under certain circumstances, can be life-threatening.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: For people with a growth mind-set, setbacks are motivating, informative input - a wakeup call.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: Man's main task in life is to give birth to himself, to become what he potentially is.
author: Erich Fromm

quote: Wealth is the abundance of valuable resources or valuable material possessions. An individual, community, region or country that possesses an abundance of such possessions or resources to the benefit of the common good is known as wealthy.
author: United Nations.

quote: Very often we need to endure the darkness of the soil like a seed. The seed has to go through the process to release its potential, before it produces fruit. That little seed is buried in the darkness of the soil. I have learned that it is not in the spotlight that God develops you. It is in the darkness of obscurity, that is where the outer shell is broken down and the beauty of God break forth.
author: Ray Bevan, Pastor

quote: Nature gives all, without reservation, and loses nothing; man, grasping all, loses everything.
author: James Allen

quote: One Of The Lessons That I Grew Up With Was To Always Stay True To Yourself And Never Let What Somebody Else Says Distract You From Your Goals.
author: Michelle Obama

quote: Our thoughts make us what we are.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: People who shine from within don't need the spotlight.
author: Pandurangan

quote: Why you need perseverance?
author: Unknown

quote: It's all to do with the training: you can do a lot if you're properly trained.
author: Queen Elizabeth II

quote: Make each day count by setting specific goals to succeed, then putting forth every effort to exceed your own expectations.
author: Les Brown

quote: No one can build you the bridge on which you, and only you, must cross the river of life.
author: Nietzsche.

quote: What doesn't kill me makes you stronger.
author: Fredrich Nietzsche

quote: Gratitude is a currency that we can mint for ourselves, and spend without fear of bankruptcy.
author: Fred De Witt Van Amburgh

quote: Arrogance closes more doors than it opens. Stay humble.
author: Toni Payne

quote: For anything worth having one must pay the price; and the price is always work, patience, love, self-sacrifice - no paper currency, no promises to pay, but the gold of real service.
author: John Burroughs

quote: Those with the growth mind-set found setbacks motivating. They're informative. They're a wake-up call.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: Talent isn't enough. You need motivation and persistence.
author: Steinbeck

quote: We all have a choice. We can choose an inner dialogue of self-encouragement and self-motivation, or we can choose one of self-defeat and self-pity. It's a power we all have. Each of us encounters hard times, hurt feelings, heartache, and physical and emotional pain. The key is to realize it's not what happens to you that matters; it's how you choose to respond.
author: Keith Harrell

quote: The measure of intelligence is the ability to change.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Whatever words we utter should be chosen with care for people will hear them and be influenced by them for good or ill.
author: Buddha

quote: Never let a bad situation bring the worst in you. Be strong and choose to be positive.
author: Unknown

quote: China and Ping-Pong, Brazil and soccer; all the successful systems have one thing in common: they institutionalize the principles of purposeful practice.
author: Mathew Syed, Bunce

quote: Failure is information; we label it failure, but it's more like, this didn't work, and I'm a problem solver, so I'll try something else.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: Entrepreneurs average three to eight failures before final success. What sets the successful ones apart is their amazing persistence. There are a lot of people out there with good and marketable ideas, but pure entrepreneurial types almost never accept defeat.
author: Lisa Amos

quote: I've observed that if individuals who prevail in a high competitive environment have any one thing in common besides success, it is failure and their ability to overcome it.
author: Bill Walsh, Head Coach

quote: You need both self-confidence and self-doubt to do your best work. A little self-doubt can keep you humble enough to realize you may need to learn more or work harder at something. It may even give you the dogged determination to keep going and show people what you're made of. Doubt, causes us to question what we're doing, mentally prepares us to accept change, propels us to work harder or differently, and can lead to us taking more cooperative approaches in dealing with people who disagree with us.
author: Alice Boyes, The Healthy Mind Toolkit

quote: If you think you can do a thing or think you can't do a thing, you're right.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Money is numbers and numbers never end. If it takes money to be happy, your search for happiness will never end.
author: Robert Nesta Marley

quote: The real test is not whether you avoid this failure, because you won't. It's whether you let it harden or shame you into inaction, or whether you learn from it; whether you choose to persevere.
author: Barack Obama

quote: Life's challenges are not supposed to paralyze you, they're supposed to help you discover who you are.
author: Bernice Johnson Reagon

quote: Obstacles, of course, are developmentally necessary: they teach kids strategy, patience, critical thinking, resilience and resourcefulness.
author: Naomi Wolf

quote: The secret of achievement is to hold a picture of a successful outcome in mind.
author: Henry David Thoreau.

quote: Without heroes, we are all plain people, and don't know how far we can go.
author: Bernard Malamud

quote: The art of life lies in a constant readjustment to our surroundings.
author: Kakuzo Okakura.

quote: Out of clutter find simplicity; From discord find harmony; In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Never throughout history has a man who lived a life of ease left a name worth remembering.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: There are only two stimulants to one's best efforts: the fear of punishment and the hope of reward.
author: John Wilson

quote: A great man is always willing to be little.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: When you stay on purpose and refuse to be discouraged by fear, you align with the infinite self, in which all possibilities exist.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Common sense would suggest that having ability, like being smart, inspires confidence. It does, but only while the going is easy. The deciding factor in life is how you handle setbacks and challenges. People with a growth mind-set welcome setbacks with open arms.

quote: A positive attitude is not about displaying a phony smile, a happy face and a perky disposition. It is simply a way of responding to life in a manner that allows us to accept the duality, the contradictions, the contrasts of our experiences.

quote: Let's execute along this strategy, but know that we'll probably get some of this wrong, so be open to changing it.
author: A.G. Lafley

quote: Knowledge is limited, whereas imagination embraces the entire world, stimulating progress, giving birth to evolution. It is, strictly speaking, a real factor in scientific research.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Character is as important as intellect.
author: Angela Duckworth

quote: It is not the strongest or the most intelligent who will survive but those who can best manage change.
author: Leon C. Megginson

quote: Setbacks and feedback aren't about your abilities, they are information you could use to help yourself learn.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: Follow effective actions with quiet reflection. From the quiet reflection will come even more effective action.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: Failure is an event not a person.
author: William D Brown

quote: Real Success comes from the difference we make
author: Unknown

quote: We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: One real blessings often appear to us in the shape of pains, loses and disappointments.
author: Joseph Addison

quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy looking for it.
author: Henry Thoreau

quote: Examples moves the world more than doctrines.
author: Henry Miller

quote: It's not what we eat but what we digest that makes us strong; not what we gain but what we save that makes us rich; not what we read but what we remember that makes us learned; and not what we profess but what we practice that gives us integrity.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: Always remember to smile and look up at what you got in life.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: From the smallest necessity to the highest religious abstraction, from the wheel to the skyscraper, everything we are and everything we have comes from one attribute of man, the function of his reasoning mind.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: The tragedy of life doesn't lie in not reaching your goal. The tragedy lies in having no goals to reach.
author: Benjamin Mays

quote: It is granted only to the heart that abounds with integrity, trust, generosity and love to realize true prosperity. The heart that is not possessed of these qualities cannot know prosperity, for prosperity, like happiness, is not an outward possession, but an inward realization.
author: James Allen

quote: Never consider yourself a victim. When you think you are a victim, you have given control of your life to somebody else. You may not be able to control your circumstances, but you can control your response to your circumstances.
author: Codolezza Rice

quote: Without a purpose and a plan, people drift aimlessly through life.

quote: For every obstacle there is a solution. Persistence is the key. The greatest mistake is giving up!
author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: One of the most important principles of success is developing the habit of going the extra mile.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Threatened by the success of others
author: Unknown

quote: He who throws dirt always loses ground.
author: Unknown

quote: Don't let compliments get to your head and don't let criticism get to your heart.
author: Lysa TerKeurst

quote: The future belongs to the curious.
author: Anonymous

quote: Nothing ventured, nothing gained.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Train yourself never to put off the word or action for the expression of gratitude.
author: Albert Schweitzer

quote: It is our attitude at the beginning of a difficult task which, more than anything else, will affect its successful outcome.
author: William James

quote: It's not enough to be busy, so are the ants. The question is, what are we busy about?
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: It is impossible to escape the impression that people commonly used false standards of measurement, that they seek power, success and wealth for themselves and admire them in others, and that they underestimate what is of true value in life.
author: Sigmund Freud, Civilization and Its Discontents

quote: Patience is the art of hoping.
author: Marquis De Vauvenargues

quote: Patience is a necessary ingredient of genius.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

author: Muhammad Ali

author: Daniel Goleman

quote: Our destiny changes with our thoughts, we shall become what we wish to become, do what we wish to do, when our habitual thoughts correspond with our desires.
author: Orison Sweet Marden

quote: Expect anything worthwhile to take a long time.
author: Debbie Millman

quote: The ultimate measure of a man is not where he stands in moments of comfort and convenience, but where he stands at times of challenge and controversy.
author: Martin Luther King Jnr.

author: Swami Vivekananda

quote: Integrity is not about doing what's easy or what's popular, it's doing what's right.

quote: The world tells us to seek success, power and money; God tells us to seek humility, service and love.
author: Pope Francis

quote: I'm a success today because I had a friend who believed in me and I didn't have the heart to let him down.

quote: I know for sure that what we dwell on is who we become.

quote: My dad said to me, 'Work hard and be patient.' It was the best advice he ever gave me. You have to put the hours in.

author: Mary Cay Ricci

author: Malcolm Gladwell

quote: Dream as big as you can dream, and anything is possible.
author: Michael Phelps

quote: It's not enough to dream the dream. Change comes from action. We need to take action to make the vision real.
author: Anonymous

quote: Patience is enduring love; experience is perfecting love; and hope is exulting love.
author: Alexander Dickens

quote: Success consists of going from failure to failure without loss of enthusiasm.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: You can imprison a man, but not an idea. You can exile a man, but not an idea. You can kill a man, but not an idea.
author: Benazir Bhutto

quote: Anyone who thinks they've outgrown the benefits of a teacher's help should at least question that view.
author: Geoff Colvin

quote: In High School he graduated 376th out of a class of 391 and struggled with reading in his early adult life. Yet his mind glowed with a fierce natural intelligence.
author: The Telegraph - The Greatest Muhammad Ali 1942 -2016

quote: A winning effort begins with preparation.
author: Joe Gibbs

quote: You are never given a wish without also being given the power to make it come true.
author: Richard Bach

quote: You need more than perseverance
author: Unknown

quote: The work praises the man.
author: Irish proverb

quote: What is defeat? Nothing but education, nothing but the first step to something better.
author: Wendell Philips

quote: Constructive criticism is not only to be expected but sought.
author: Margaret Chase Smith

quote: You must take personal responsibility. You cannot change the circumstances, the seasons, or the wind, but you can change yourself.

quote: He only profits from praise who values criticism.

quote: I believe that every person is born with talent.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Lives of great men all remind us we can make our lives sublime; and departing, leave behind us, footprints on the sands of time.
author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: A Clear Vision, Backed By Definite Plans, Gives You A Tremendous Feeling Of Confidence And Personal Power.

author: P. Tough

quote: Lust and force are the source of all our actions; lust causes voluntary actions, force involuntary ones.
author: Blaise Pascal

They do this for the most part in three ways: by bending, breaking and blending, Bending involves taking something and altering a property, breaking involves taking a whole part and assembling something new from fragments. And blending involves mixing multiple sources together in new ways.

quote: A little more persistence, a little more effort, and what seemed hopeless failure may turn to glorious success.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Your life is a message to the world make sure it's inspiring.
author: Maeve Garriosn

quote: Press on: nothing in the world can take the place of perseverance. Talent will not; nothing is more common than an unsuccessful men with talent. Genius will not; unrewarded genius is almost a proverb. Education will not; the world is full of educated derelicts. Persistence and determination alone are omnipotent.
author: Calvin Coolidge

quote: Success is a matter of constant growth.
author: Deepak Chopra, Spiritual teacher

quote: Dream lofty dreams, and as you dream, so shall you become. Your Vision is the promise of what you shall one day be. Your Ideal is the prophecy of what you shall at last unveil.
author: James Allen

quote: Don't just make money, make an impact.
author: Bob Gass, author, UCB

quote: Rather fail with honour than succeed by fraud.
author: Sophocles

quote: It is not the strongest of the species that survive, nor the most intelligent, but the one most responsive to change.
author: Charles Darwin

quote: Reading is to the mind what exercise is to the body
author: Sir Richard Steele

quote: Our thoughts determine our lives.
author: Unknown

quote: For those who are willing to make an effort, great miracles and wonderful treasures are in store.
author: Isaac Bashevis Singer

quote: Our goals can only be reached through a vehicle of a plan, in which we must fervently believe, and upon which we must vigorously act. There is no other route to success.

quote: Feedback is one of the most powerful influences on learning and achievement, but this impact can be either positive or negative.

quote: Attitude is everything: change your attitude and you change your life.
author: Jeffrey Keller

quote: Failure is information.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: Elvis Prestly You ain't goin' nowhere, son. You ought to go back to drivin' a truck.
author: Manager, Eddie Bond

quote: All difficult, long-term achievements require grit, because if you are taking on challenges, setbacks are inevitable but with grit and patience you will succeed
author: Angela Duckworth

quote: To the person who does not know where he wants to go there is no favourable wind.
author: Seneca the Younger

quote: There is nothing noble in being superior to your fellow man; true nobility is being superior to your former self.
author: Ernest Hemingway
