quote: Envy is a littleness of soul, which cannot see beyond a certain point, and if it does not occupy the whole space, feels itself excluded.
author: William Hazlitt

quote: The more you challenge your mind to learn, the more your brain cells grow.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: While life is a series of experiences, each one of which makes us bigger, even though sometimes it is hard to realize this. For the world was built to develop character, and we must learn that the setbacks and grieves which we endure help us in our marching onward.
author: Henry Ford

author: Denis Waitley

quote: There Are No Limits To What You Can Accomplish, Except The Limits You Place On Your Own Thinking.

author: Plutarch

Goals are great because they cause us to stretch and grow in ways that we never have before. In order to reach our goals, we must become better.

quote: Envy is ignorance.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: To love what you do and feel that it matters, how could anything be more fun?
author: Catherine Graham

quote: If you want to find happiness, find gratitude.
author: Steve Maraboli

author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Think, act and talk with enthusiasm and you will attract positive results.

quote: Fear, desire, hope will push us on toward the future.

quote: Go to bed smarter than when you woke up.

author: J. Sidlow Baxter

author: Malcolm Forbes

quote: Tomorrow Is Now: It Is Today That We Must Create the World of the Future.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: There are no secrets to success it is the results of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
author: Colin Powell

One has to keep this constantly in mind if one wishes to understand spiritual movements and their development. Feeling and longing are the motive force behind all human endeavour and human creation, in however exalted a guise the latter may present themselves to us.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The most important investment you can make is in yourself.
author: Anonymous

quote: Anger is never without a reason, but seldom a good one.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Never think that God's delays are God's denials. Hold on! hold fast! hold out! Patience is genius.
author: Count De Buffon

author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: If you are humble nothing will touch you, neither praise nor disgrace, because you know what you are.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: The fault you see in your brothers is really in you, the world is a mirror.
author: Unknown

quote: Wealth is the progressive realization of worthy goals, the ability to love and have compassion, meaningful and caring relationships.
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: While we tend to think of success along two metrics- money and power, we need to add a third -a third measure of success that goes beyond the two metrics of money and power, and consists of four pillars: well-being, wisdom, wonder, and giving.

quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.

quote: I think with practice, you can be whatever you want to be, and with a goal you can go in any direction that you want to go in.

quote: I learned to turn stumbles and missteps into sources of motivation.
author: Michelle Obama

quote: Excellence is going the extra mile.
author: Joyce Meyer

topic: Not all practice leads to success
quote: Practice does not make perfect. Only perfect practice makes perfect.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Troubles, like babies, grow larger by nursing.
author: Lady Holland

quote: The new survival skills: effective communication, curiosity, and critical-thinking skills are no longer skills that only the elites in a society must muster; they are essential survival skills for all of us.
author: Yong Zhao

quote: It takes humility to seek feedback. It takes wisdom to understand it, analyse it, and appropriately act on it.
author: Stephen Covey,

quote: Whatever we plant in our subconscious mind and nourish with repetition and emotion will one day become a reality.
author: Earl Nightingale

quote: A dream written down with a date becomes a goal. A goal broken down into steps becomes a plan. A plan backed by action makes your dreams come true.
author: Greg S. Reid

quote: You're in charge of your mind. You can help it grow by using it in the right way.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: Attitude is more important than the past, than education, than money, than circumstances, than what people do or say. It is more important than appearance, giftedness, or skill.
author: W C Fields

author: Robert Frost

quote: Have patience. All things are difficult before they become easy.
author: Saddi

quote: All men who have turned out worth anything have had the chief hand in their own education.
author: Sir Walter Scott

author: John Wooden, Coach, 10x National Champion

quote: Early in my career...I had to choose between an honest arrogance and a hypercritical humility... I deliberately choose an honest arrogance, and I've never been sorry.
author: Frank Lloyd Wright

author: Carol Dweck

quote: Be curious, not judgmental.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: Albert Einstein (age 10) - 'You will never amount to much'
author: Schoolmaster.

quote: Nothing is more honourable than a grateful heart.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: You may have to fight a battle more than once to win it.
author: Margaret Thatcher

quote: Jealousy is simply and clearly the fear that you do not have value. Jealousy scans for evidence to prove the point that others will be preferred and rewarded more than you. There is only one alternative, self-value. If you cannot love yourself, you will not believe that you are loved. You will always think it's a mistake or luck.
author: Jennifer James

quote: A successful person never loses, they either win or learn!
author: John Calipari

quote: We learn by practice. Whether it means to learn to dance by practicing dancing or to learn to live by practicing living, the principles are the same.
author: Martha Graham

quote: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: It's the quality of the feedback rather than its existence or absence that determines its power.
author: Stiggins

quote: I am just a child who has never grown up. I still keep asking these 'how' and 'why' questions. Occasionally, I find an answer.
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: Success is measured in many ways. The most important of which is how you feel about yourself
author: Lina King

quote: IQ was the predictor of success in the 20th century, in the 21st century, self-regulation will be the predictor of success.
author: Dr. L. Bisnaire, Dr. J. Clinton and Dr. B. Ferguson

quote: Be true to your work, your word, and your friend.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Where there is no vision the people perish.
author: Proverbs 29:18

quote: The moment you feel you have the right to belittle others because you think you're better than them is the same minute you've proven you're worse.
author: Joanne Crisner Alcayaga, writer

quote: Your Attitude is Your Window to the World, keep your attitude window clean and bright!
author: Jeffrey Keller

quote: Do the one thing you think you cannot do. Fail at it. Try again. Do better the second time. The only people who never tumble are those who never mount the high wire. This is your moment. Own it.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Curiosity is one of the great secrets of happiness.
author: Bryant H. McGill

quote: One who fears failure limits his activities.
author: Henry Ford

quote: The possession of a perfect knowledge of your business is an absolute necessity in order to insure success.
author: P.T. Barnum

quote: We must have perseverance and above all confidence in ourselves.
author: Marie Curie

quote: Patience and Diligence, like faith, remove mountains.
author: William Penn

quote: Happiness resides not in possessions, and not in gold, happiness dwells in the soul.
author: Democritus

quote: Let the path be open to talent
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: You fail all the time, but you aren't a failure until you start blaming someone else.
author: Bum Phillips, Head Coach

quote: Reflect upon your present blessings, of which every man has many, not on your past misfortunes, of which all men have some.
author: Charles Dickens

quote: What you do is what matters, not what you think or say or plan
author: Jason Fried, David Heinemeier Hansson

quote: Motivation drives metacognitive skills which in turn activate learning and thinking skills, which then provide feedback to the metacognitive skills, enabling one's level of expertise to increase.
author: Sternberg

quote: Intelligence is an elusive concept. There's a certain sharpness, an ability to absorb new facts. To walk into a situation, have something explained to you and immediately say, "Well, what about this?"To ask an insightful question. To absorb it in real time. A capacity to remember. To relate to domains that may not seem connected at first. A certain creativity that allows people to be effective.
author: Bill Gates

quote: Optimism is a happiness magnet. If you stay positive, good things and good people will be drawn to you.
author: Mary Lou Retton

quote: The healthiest competition occurs when average people win by putting above average effort.
author: Colin Powell

quote: Inspired by his history teacher
author: Unknown

quote: Love and gratitude can part seas, move mountains, and create miracles.
author: Rhonda Byrne

quote: A critic is a legless man who teaches running.
author: Channing Pollock

quote: The Coca Cola Company. Sold only 400 bottles its first year in business.
author: Unknown

quote: Why do you look so sad and forsaken? When one door is closed, don't you know another is open
author: Bob Marley

quote: There is no road too long to the man who advances deliberately and without undue haste; there are no honours too distant to the man who prepares himself for them with patience.
author: La Bruyere, Les Caracteres

quote: The man who can drive himself further when the effort gets painful is the man who will win. Mind-set
author: Roger Bannister

quote: Humility, gentleness, and helpfulness go so much further and open doors you cannot imagine.
author: Ann Tran

quote: Complaining is an obvious sign of a fixed mind-set. A growth mind-set looks for opportunity in everything, so there's no room for complaints.
author: Dr Travis Bradberry

quote: Be willing to give that extra effort that separates the winner from the one in second place.
author: Carol Dweck, H. Jackson Brown Jr.

quote: It's fine to celebrate success but it is more important to heed the lessons of failure.
author: Bill Gates

quote: If money is your hope for independence you will never have it. The only real security that a man can have in this world is a reserve of knowledge, experience, and ability.
author: Henry Ford

quote: A successful entrepreneur can't be afraid of failures or setbacks. An initial setback can be a great opportunity to take a new and more promising approach to any problem, to come back stronger than ever.
author: John Roos

quote: Our happiness depends on the habit of mind we cultivate. So practice happy thinking every day. Cultivate the merry heart, develop the happiness habit, and life will become a continual feast. Norman Vincent Peale
author: Unknown

quote: The ability to learn faster than your competitors may be the only sustainable competitive advantage.
author: Arie de Geus

quote: In a study of skills that distinguish star performers in every field from entry-level jobs to executive positions, the single most important factor was not IQ, advanced degrees, or technical experience, it was EQ.' Of the competencies required for excellent in performance in the job studies, 67% were emotional competencies.
author: Daniel Goleman

quote: Happiness mainly comes from our own attitude, rather than from external factors.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: The only man who makes no mistakes is the man who never does anything.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Life consist not in holding good cards, but in playing those you do hold well.
author: Josh Billings

quote: The coin of competition is knowledge
author: Richard R Elsworth, Leading with Purpose

quote: He who spends time regretting the past loses the present and risks the future.
author: Quevedo

quote: Satisfaction lies in the effort, not in the attainment, full effort is full victory.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Some succeed because they are destined to, but most succeed because they are determined to.
author: Henry Van Dyke

quote: I didn't start off being able to sing or play the guitar, I had to learn to do both of them.
author: Ed Sheran

quote: A 'fixed mind-set' assumes that our character, intelligence, and creative ability are static givens which we can't change in any meaningful way, and success is the affirmation of that inherent intelligence. A 'growth mind-set', on the other hand, thrives on challenge and sees failure not as evidence of unintelligence but as a heartening springboard for growth and for stretching our existing abilities.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: Instead of counting your days, make your days count.
author: Unknown

quote: Some people dream of success while others wake up and work hard at it.
author: Mark Zuckerberg

quote: Challenges are what make life interesting and overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.
author: Joshua J. Marine

quote: Analysing past mistakes and setbacks may improve your future performance.
author: Meg Selig

quote: Let me tell you the secret that has led to my goal. My strength lies solely in my tenacity.
author: Louis Pasteur

quote: The men who have done big things are those who were not afraid to attempt big things, who were not afraid to risk failure in order to gain success.
author: B. C. Forbes

quote: There are no traffic jams on the extra mile.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Diamonds are nothing more than chunks of coal that stuck to their jobs.
author: Malcolm Forbes

quote: Be bold, mighty forces will come to your aid.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Sometimes things aren't clear right away. That's where you need to be patient and persevere and see where things lead.

quote: Anyone who has never made a mistake has never tried anything new.

quote: The dread of criticism is the death of genius.
author: William Gilmore Simms

quote: Genius is nothing but a great aptitude for patience.
author: George-Louis de Buffon

quote: If we choose to be no more than clods of clay, then we shall be used as clods of clay for braver feet to tread on.
author: Marie Corelli

quote: Grit is not just having resilience in the face of failure, but also having deep commitments that you remain loyal to over years.
author: Angela Duckworth, D. Perkins-Gough

quote: We have to keep learning, growing and building on our strengths.
author: Unknown

quote: Let no feeling of discouragement prey upon you, and in the end you are sure to succeed.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: No legacy is so rich as honesty.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
author: John D. Rockefeller

quote: You can have all the talent in the world, but without determination, you won't get very far.
author: Malorie Blackman

quote: Eventually the effects go beyond even that. Many years of intensive deliberate practice actually change the body and the brain.
author: Mathew Syed

quote: All progress takes place outside the comfort zone.
author: Michael John Bobak

quote: A belief system that suggests that one's intelligence can be grown or developed with persistence, effort and a focus on learning. Add to this belief an effective teacher armed with instructional tools that differentiate, respond to learner's needs, and nurture critical thinking processes and you have a recipe for optimum student learning.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: Big thinking precedes great achievement.
author: Wilferd Peterson

quote: Grades in school are not the best criteria for success. Integrity, adaptive Intelligent and energy are the key criteria for success
author: Conor Neill

quote: It is easier to find men who will volunteer to die, than to find those who are willing to endure pain with patience.
author: Julius Caesar

quote: When emotional intelligence merges with spiritual intelligence, human nature is transformed.
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: If a man is called to be a street sweeper, he should sweep streets even as Michelangelo painted, or Beethoven composed music or Shakespeare wrote poetry. He should sweep streets so well that all the hosts of heaven and earth will pause to say, here lived a great street sweeper who did his job well.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: Both success and failure are largely the results of habits.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Let gratitude be the pillow upon which you kneel to say your nightly prayer. And let faith be the bridge you build to overcome evil and welcome good.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Education conquers all. Give us education and we, in no more than a century, will change the character of Europe.
author: C.A. Helvetius

quote: Act with kindness, but do not expect gratitude.
author: Confucius

quote: You are not here merely to make a living. You are here to enable the world to live more amply, with greater vision, and with a finer spirit of hope and achievement. You are here to enrich the world. You impoverish yourself if you forget this errand.
author: Woodrow Wilson

quote: Drawing comparisons between yourself and other people is like comparing apples and oranges. Your journey is unique and it's important to honour your individuality.
author: Amy Morin, author

quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: You will never be a genius unless you make it a habit to do more and better than you are paid to do, every single day of your life.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: The more you practice and study, the better you are... so I still practice and study all the time.
author: Cyndi Lauper

quote: Who does not thank for little will not thank for much.
author: Estonian proverb

quote: The reward of eternal life requires effort.
author: Thomas S. Monson

quote: Attitudes are nothing more than habits of thoughts, and habits can be acquired.
author: Bob Gass, UCB

quote: If you really want to do something, you'll find a way. If you don't, you'll find an excuse.
author: John Rohn

quote: Going far beyond that call of duty, doing more than others expect, this is what excellence is all about! And it comes from striving, maintaining the highest standards, looking after the smallest detail, and going the extra mile. Excellence means doing your very best. In everything! In every way.
author: Jack Johnson

quote: Believing that your qualities are carved in stone, the fixed mind-set creates an urgency to prove yourself over and over. If you have only a certain amount of intelligence, a certain personality, and a certain moral character - well, then you'd better prove that you have a healthy dose of them. It simply wouldn't do to look or feel deficient in these most basic characteristics.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: The most important investment you can make is in yourself. Very few people get anything like their potential horsepower translated into the actual horsepower of their output in life. Potential exceeds realization for many people.. The best asset is in your own self. You can become to an enormous degree the person you want to be
author: Warren Buffett.

quote: There's only one growth strategy: work hard.
author: William Hague

quote: Nothing can come of nothing.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: I criticize by creation, not by finding fault.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: Both enjoyed lucrative near-monopolies of their home markets: Kodak selling film in America, Fujifilm in Japan. Why did these two firms fare so differently? Both firms saw their traditional business rendered obsolete by digital photography and the mobile phone. But whereas Kodak has so far failed to adapt adequately, Fujifilm has transformed itself into a solidly profitable business by developing better strategy to adapt to the new trend.
author: The Economist January 2012

quote: Stay committed to your decisions, but stay flexible in your approach. It's the end you're after.
author: Anthony Robbins

quote: Limitations live only in our minds. But if we use our imaginations, our possibilities become limitless.
author: Jamie Paolinetti

quote: People with growth mind-set don't feel helpless because they know that in order to be successful, you need to be willing to fail hard and then bounce right back.
author: Dr Travis Bradberry

quote: Nothing can stop the man with the right mental attitude from achieving his goal; nothing on earth can help the man with the wrong mental attitude.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: The more you know, the more prepared you will be when opportunity knocks. If you are lazy and while your time away, you would not know how to take advantage of opportunities even if they stared you in the face.
author: Li Ka Shing

quote: The world has a way of giving what is demanded of it. If you are frightened and look for failure and poverty, you will get them, no matter how hard you may try to succeed. Lack of faith in yourself, in what life will do for you, cuts you off from the good things of the world. Expect victory and you make victory. Nowhere is this truer than in business that is, where bravery and faith bring both material and spiritual reward.
author: Preston Bradley

quote: Mistakes should be examined, learned from, and discarded; not dwelled upon and stored.
author: Tim Fargo

quote: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
author: Colin Powell

quote: Gratitude is not only the greatest of virtues but the parent of all others.
author: Marcus Tellius Cicero

quote: Experience is not what happens to you; it is what you do with what happens to you.
author: Aldous Huxley

quote: Industry is a better horse to ride than genius.
author: Walter Lipman

quote: Necessity, is the mother of our invention.
author: Plato

quote: If there is any one secret of success, it lies in the ability to get the other person's point of view and see things from that person's angle as well as from your own.
author: Henry Ford

quote: It's not fun to be criticize, but it can help you if you learn from it.
author: Anonymous

quote: Too often we underestimate the power of a touch, a smile, a kind word, a listening ear, an honest compliment, or the smallest act of caring, all of which have the potential to turn a life around.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: A person's wisdom yields patience; it is to one's glory to overlook an offense.
author: Proverbs

quote: If at first you don't succeed, try again.
author: T. H. Palmer

quote: Effort is what makes you smart and talented.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: What is it about this person's success that has me feeling threatened?' Or, How can I learn from what I see in them or in what they've accomplished?
author: Mike Robbins

quote: The passion for stretching yourself and sticking to it, even (or especially) when it's not going well, is the hallmark of the growth mind-set.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: Stop comparing yourself to other people. You're not in a race. Your job is to do your best with what you've been given, regardless of what those around you are doing.
author: Amy Morin, Author

quote: The pessimist sees the difficulty in every opportunity; the optimist sees the opportunity in every difficulty.
author: L P Jacks

quote: Each of us makes his own weather, determine the colour of the skies in the emotional universe which he inhabits
author: Fulton Sheen

quote: God answers all prayers. Sometimes his answer is no, when his answer is no, we don't immediately understand, but in due course we will understand and be grateful he said no.
author: Attoh-Dedei

quote: Anyone who stops learning is old, whether at twenty or eighty. Anyone who keeps learning stays young.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are.
author: E. E. Cummings

quote: It is with our heart that one sees rightly, what is essential is invisible to the eye.
author: Antoine de Saint Exupery, The little Prince

quote: ...talent means nothing, while experience, acquired in humility and with hard work, means everything.
author: Patrick Suskind

quote: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Gratitude unlocks the fullness of life. It turns what we have into enough, and more. It turns denial into acceptance, chaos to order, confusion to clarity. It can turn a meal into a feast, a house into a home, a stranger into a friend.
author: Melody Beattie

quote: Many times a day I realize how much my outer and inner life is based upon the labours of my fellow men, both living and dead, and how much I must exert myself in order to give in return as much as I have received.
author: Einstein

quote: We fail more often by timidity than by over-daring.
author: David Grayson

quote: Start going the extra mile and opportunity will follow you.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Believing that your qualities are carved in stone - the fixed mind-set creates an urgency to prove yourself over and over. On the other hand, the growth mind-set believes that, the hand you're dealt is just the starting point for development.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: Fixed-mind-set a belief system that suggests that a person has a predetermined amount of intelligence, skills, or talents. Success is about proving you're smart or talented. Growth mind-set is a belief system that suggests that one's intelligence can be grown or developed with persistence, effort, and a focus on learning. It's about stretching yourself to learn something new. Developing yourself.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: Learn to see in another's calamity the ills which you should avoid.
author: Publilius Syrus

quote: My goal is simple. It is a complete understanding of the universe, why it is as it is and why it exists at all.
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: Try not to become a man of success, but rather try to become a man of value.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: We are wiser when older, but we learn more easily when younger.
author: Aristotle

quote: Never leave that till tomorrow which you can do today.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Take into account that great love and great achievements involve great risk.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: These children understand that no one has ever accomplished great things, not Mozart, Darwin or Michael Jordan without years of passionate practice and learning.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: Four short words sum up what has lifted most successful individuals above the crowd: a little bit more.
author: Lou Vickery

quote: Deliberate practice requires that one identify certain sharply defined elements of performance that need to be improved, and then work intently on them.
author: Geoff Colvin

quote: You are never a failure until you give up.
author: Richard Nixon

quote: A man's mistakes are his portals of discovery.
author: James Joyce

quote: Adaptive Intelligence is our ability to quickly observe change and quickly change direction to avoid trouble, for example, when you are running and you see a lamp post coming towards you, how quickly do you notice the lamp post that is in your path and quickly change direction to avoid being hit by the lamp post?
author: Conor Neill

quote: Gold medals are made out of sweat, blood and tears and effort in the gym every day.
author: Gabby Douglas

quote: Our genes influence our intelligence and talents, but these qualities are not fixed at birth
author: Carol Dweck

quote: If you want to accomplish the goals of your life, you have to begin with the spirit.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: People may start with different temperaments and different aptitudes, but it is clear that experience, training and personal effort take them the rest of the way.
author: Robert Sternber

quote: Once you start building a more positive attitude, life will throw some incredible opportunities your way!
author: Jeff Keller

quote: I do not believe in genius, only persistent, courageous and labour.
author: M. Reger

quote: Creativity is inventing, experimenting, growing, taking risks, breaking rules, making mistakes, and having fun.
author: Mary Lou Cook

quote: Do not let the sun set without doing something.
author: Latin Proverb

quote: To climb steep hills requires a slow pace at first.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: If I can't picture it, I can't understand it
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Be brave enough to know that success can be measured in many different ways
author: Nicola Padfield

quote: We're going to democratize the automobile.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Moonlight floods the whole sky from horizon to horizon; how much it can fill your room depends on its windows. Wisdom is everywhere, but it is up to you how much you acquire. You have to be open to learning, understanding, and applying wisdom in your life.
author: The 13th century Sufi mystic, Rumi

quote: It is very important to generate a good attitude, a good heart, as much as possible. From this, happiness in both the short term and the long term for both yourself and others will come.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Mistakes and errors are the discipline through which we advance.
author: Channing

quote: Yesterday is history. Tomorrow is a mystery. But today is a gift. That's why they call it the present.
author: Unknown

quote: Isolated people have vastly increased rate of premature death from all causes and are 3-5x likelier to die early than people with strong social ties.
author: Dean Ornish

quote: If I shoot at the sun, I may hit a star.
author: P.T. Barnum

quote: Definiteness of purpose is the starting point of all achievement.
author: W. Clement Stone

quote: Instead of letting your hardships and failures discourage or exhaust you, let them inspire you. Let them make you even hungrier to succeed.
author: Michelle Obama.

quote: When a man is in the right path, he must persevere.
author: P.T. Barnum

quote: People may doubt what you say, but they will believe what you do.
author: Cass, Lewis

quote: Many people dream of success. To me success can only be achieved through repeated failure and introspection. Success is the 1% that results from the 99% we call failure.
author: Soichiro Honda

quote: With ordinary talent and extraordinary'perseverance, all things are attainable.
author: Thomas Fowell Buxton

quote: Creative is the place where no one else has ever been. You have to leave the city of your comfort and go into the wilderness of your intuition.
author: Alan Alda

quote: Some people are going to reject you, simply because you shine too bright for them. And that is okay, keep shining.
author: Mandy Hale

quote: Example is not the main thing in influencing others. It is the only thing.
author: Albert Schweitzer

quote: Good character is not formed in a week or a month. It is created little by little, day by day. Protracted and patient effort is needed to develop good character.
author: Heraclitus

quote: A positive attitude can really make dreams come true, it did for me.
author: David Bailey

quote: Always remember that your present situation is not your final destination. The best is yet to come.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: To accomplish great things we must dream as well as act.
author: Anatole France

quote: Judgement can be acquired only by acute observation, by actual experience in the school of life, by ceaseless alertness to learn from others, by study of the activities of men who have made notable marks, by striving to analyse the everyday play of causes and effects, by constant study of human nature
author: B. C. Forbes

quote: Dedication and passion can overcome any obstacle.
author: Unknown

quote: How many people are completely successful in every department of life? Not one. The most successful people are the ones who learn from their mistakes and turn their failures into opportunities.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: A business that makes nothing but money is a poor kind of business.
author: Henry Ford

quote: I am fascinated with the way Henry Ford approached life. He was one of those people who didn't take a job because he knew how to do it, he often took jobs because he didn't know how to do them, and they were opportunities to learn. It's a very gutsy way to learn.
author: Bob Casey, retired curator of transportation, Ford

quote: You can set a direct course for your future by defining your goals, or, you can take the opposite position and just let the future haphazardly unfold by itself.
author: Catherine Pulsifer

quote: I know God will not give me anything I cannot handle. I just wish he didn't trust me with so much
author: Mother Teresa

quote: A good plan violently executed now is better than a perfect plan executed next week
author: Georg Patton

quote: Good words are worth much, and cost little.
author: George Herbert

quote: To the timid and hesitating everything is impossible because it seems.
author: Sir Walter Scott

quote: If I have ever made any valuable discoveries, it has been due more to patient attention, than to any other talent.
author: Isaac Newton

quote: I would like people to recognize in looking at my story that the person who has the most to do with what happens to you is you. It's not the environment, it's not the other people who were there trying to help you or trying to stop you. It's what you decide to do and how much effort you put behind it.
author: Ben Carson

quote: If you can let go of passion and follow your curiosity, your curiosity just might lead you to your passion.
author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quote: The big secret in life is there is no secret. Whatever your goal. You can get there if you're willing to work.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Grit is perseverance, or stick-to-it-iveness. Grit is important for children and adults alike because if you are taking on challenges, setbacks are inevitable. The difference is how we react to setbacks.
author: Angela Duckworth

quote: Don't compare yourself to others. There is no comparison between the sun and the moon. They shine when it's their time.
author: Unknown

quote: Even after getting rejected by dozens of publishers, I persisted.
author: J K Rowling

quote: Nobody likes being criticized. But how you handle it makes all the difference. If you lock up and become defensive, you're likely to waste a lot of time feeling bad--and repeating the same behaviour that was a problem to begin with.
author: Anonymous

quote: The important thing is not to stop questioning, curiosity has its own reason for existing.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: All that we are is the result of what we have thought. The mind is everything. What we think, we become.
author: Buddha

quote: Threats by the success of others can sometimes bring up feelings of jealousy, insecurity, and inferiority as well especially when someone accomplishes or experiences something you personally want and or worry that you can't or won't.
author: Mike Robbins

quote: My mother always taught me never to look back in regret but to move on to the next thing. The amount of time people waste dwelling on failures rather than putting that energy into another project, always amazes me. I have fun running all the Virgin businesses-so a setback is never a bad experience, just a learning curve.
author: Richard Branson

quote: The essence of'strategy'is choosing what not to do.
author: Michael Porter.

quote: Passion will increase your willpower, only when you want something badly enough will you pay the price to achieve it.
author: Bob Gass, author, the Word for Today

quote: All human beings are very creative, full of potential, full of energy
author: Muhammad Yunus

quote: Take chances, make mistakes. That's how you grow. Pain nourishes your courage. You have to fail in order to practice being brave.
author: Mary Tyler Moore

quote: We do not need magic to change the world, we carry all the power we need inside ourselves already: we have the power to imagine better.
author: J.K. Rowling, Harvard University

quote: Love and kindness are never wasted. They always make a difference. They bless the one who receives them, and they bless you, the giver.
author: Barbara De Angelis

quote: Nothing is impossible. With so many people saying it couldn't be done, all it takes is an imagination.
author: Michael Phelps

quote: We define emotional intelligence as the subset of social intelligence that involves the ability to monitor one's own and others' feelings and emotions, to discriminate among them and to use this information to guide one's thinking and actions.
author: Salovey and Mayer

quote: Intelligence has three aspects: analytical, creative, and practical.
author: Sternberg

quote: Patience and perseverance have a magical effect before which difficulties appear and obstacles vanish.
author: John Quincy Adams

quote: What she found was that those with a fixed mind-set were only interested in hearing feedback that reflected directly on their present ability, but tuned out information that could help them learn and improve. They even showed no interest in hearing the right answer when they had gotten a question wrong, because they had already filed it away in the failure category. Those with a growth mind-set, on the other hand, were keenly attentive to information that could help them expand their existing knowledge and skill, regardless of whether they'd gotten the question right or wrong - in other words, their priority was learning, not the binary trap of success and failure.
author: Carol Dweck, from her research

quote: The way to develop the best that is in a person is by appreciation and encouragement.
author: Charles Schwab

quote: Shoot for the moon, even if you miss, you will land among stars.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: Invest in yourself, in your education. There's nothing better.
author: Sylvia Porter

quote: Failure is God's own tool for carving some of the finest outlines in the character of his children.
author: Thomas Hodgkin

quote: Good ideas are not adopted automatically. They must be driven into practice with courageous patience.
author: Hyman Rickover

quote: I've learned that it's not a straight road to the top, and there are going to be setbacks along the way. You have to be patient, and you have to keep believing in what you're doing. And keep believing in yourself, no matter what is happening. And then eventually you'll get there.
author: Eugenie Bouchard

quote: Knowledge and skill are not things that you are born with but things that you can cultivate. You have the ability to become more intelligent, more artistic, more athletic, and more successful simply by focusing on the process, not the outcome. The daily choices you make will influence what you believe and the person you will become. It's not about the result, it's about becoming the type of person who gets to enjoy those results.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: Designing a winning strategy is the art of asking questions, experimenting and then constantly renewing the thinking process by questioning the answers. No matter how good today's strategy is, you must always keep reinventing it.
author: Constantinos Markides

quote: Success is about pursuing your passion and making an impact in the world
author: Barbara Premo

quote: You have to keep pushing toward those dreams no matter what setbacks happen.
author: Anthony Hamilton

quote: Once your mind-set changes, everything on the outside will change along with it.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: Learn from Failure. Failure presents an opportunity for continued learning and growth while success can lead to complacency and stagnation.
author: C. Manz

quote: Patience is bitter. But its fruit is sweet.
author: Aristotle

quote: Your path unravels as you walk, you can't discover it by standing still therefore keep moving, keep exploring, keep learning.
author: Justicia Minkah Premo

quote: Greed's worst point is its ingratitude.
author: Seneca

quote: The greater the effort, the greater the glory.
author: Pierre Corneille

quote: Sheer persistence is the difference between success and failure.
author: Donald Trump

quote: Any fact facing us is not as important as our attitude toward it, for that determines our success or failure. The way you think about a fact may defeat you before you ever do anything about it. You are overcome by the fact because you think you are.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: Critics only make you stronger. You have to look at what they are saying as feedback. Sometimes the feedback helps, and other times, it's just noise that can be a distraction.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: A person with a fixed mind-set is often a high achiever, who blames outside forces when they fail at a task.
author: Unknown

quote: When you show deep empathy toward others, their defensive energy goes down, and positive energy replaces it. That's when you can get more creative in solving problems.
author: Stephen Covey

quote: Everyone encounters unanticipated adversity. People with an empowered, growth-oriented mind-set embrace adversity as a means for improvement, as opposed to something that holds them back. When an unexpected situation challenges an empowered person, they flex until they get results.
author: Dr Travis Bradley, author

quote: All of us can build our knowledge, but most of us won't put in the effort.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: The one exclusive sign of thorough knowledge is the power of teaching.
author: Aristotle

quote: Some of the greatest successes resulted from the worst failures.
author: Winston Churchill.

quote: He is poor who is dissatisfied; he is rich who is contented with what he has, and he is richer who is generous with what he has.
author: James Allen

quote: It is difficult to inspire others to accomplish what you haven't been willing to try.
author: Unknown

quote: Mind-set is what separates the best from the rest.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: Patience will benefit you in every hour, every time and every opportunity. It helps you to overcome your opponent, howsoever strong he may be. It will help you in times of distress and hardships, in battles and in war and peace.
author: Abd al-Karim Qasim

quote: The victory of success is half won when one gains the habit of setting and achieving goals.
author: Og Mandino

quote: The meaning of things lies not in the things themselves, but in our attitude towards them.
author: Antoine de Saint Exupery

quote: Keep your eyes on the stars and your feet on the ground.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: He who learns but does not think, is lost! He who thinks but does not learn is in great danger.
author: Confucius

quote: All that a man achieves and all that he fails to achieve is a direct result of his own thoughts.
author: James Allen

quote: Nothing of what has happened to me, or to anyone, has value unless it is a preparation for what lies ahead.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Always try to associate yourself with and learn as much as you can from those who know more than you do, who do better than you, who see more clearly than you.
author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: Curiosity is the hunger of the human mind.
author: Rose Wilder Lane

quote: Gratitude is the memory of the heart
author: Karl Barth

quote: Everyone knows that high IQ is no guarantee of success, happiness, or virtue.
author: Daniel Goleman

quote: Your brain grows new connections as you learn new skills. The change is gradual, as your brain cells develop new connections to speed the efficiency of new skills acquired.
author: Travis Bradberry

quote: Success is steady progress toward one's personal goals.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Instead of letting those feelings defeat you, let them motivate you.
author: Michelle Obama

quote: Act so as to elicit the best in others and thereby in thyself.
author: Felix Adler

quote: To lose is to learn.
author: Anonymous

quote: Nobody can hurt me without my permission.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: For success, attitude is equally as important as ability.
author: Walter Scott

quote: We need to teach a highly educated person that it is not a disgrace to fail, and that he must analyse every failure to find its cause. He must learn how to fail intelligently, for failing is one of the greatest arts of the world.
author: Charles F Kettering

quote: The abundance flow of all good things to you.
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: When people see a legend, they call it a legend. But to be a legend, it's a lot of hard work and patience. You can't play for five or ten years and be a legend. It takes longer than that.
author: Burning Spear

quote: What a wonderful life I've had! I only wish I'd realized it sooner.
author: Colette

quote: Only passions, great passions, can elevate the soul to great things.
author: Denis Diderot

quote: Persistence and determination alone are omnipotent.
author: Calvin Coolidge

quote: We must embrace intermittent discomfort. Our human instinct is to avoid pain at any cost, but growth requires pushing past our current comfort zone.
author: Unknown

quote: People who boast about their IQ are losers.
author: Stephen Hawkins

quote: Rich people read for self-improvement, education and success.
author: www.businessinsider.com

quote: Do not spoil what you have by desiring what you have not.
author: Epicurus

quote: Belief that abilities, intelligence, talent are developed so that they can lead to the creation of new and better ideas.
author: George Couros

quote: Like success, failure is many things to many people. With a positive mental attitude, failure is a learning experience, a rung on the ladder, and a plateau at which to get your thoughts in order and prepare to try again.
author: W Clement Stone

quote: Patience, persistence, and perspiration make an unbeatable combination for success.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Dwell upon the brightest parts in every prospect .. and strive to be pleased with the present circumstances.
author: Abraham Tucker

quote: Developing emotional intelligence is one way to protect yourself from damaging relationships. Emotional intelligence is a science that has been studied and researched for over a decade. According to the theories, mutual respect and effective communication are key.
author: Liz Miller

quote: A contented mind is the greatest blessing a man can enjoy in this world.
author: Joseph Addison

quote: Grit predicts success over and beyond talent. When you consider individuals of equal talent, the grittier ones do better.
author: Angela Duckworth & Carol Dweck

quote: The raw elements of gold and silver are refined and purified by intense heat. The same is true for you and me. To attain the purest beauty of who we truly are, we all must be forged by fire. The struggles and trials we suffer and learn from are all part of the refining process towards the priceless beauty that's within us all. God knows that at your soul's enduring core lies the truest of all treasures.
author: Jason Versey

quote: Very little is needed to make a happy life; it is all within yourself, in your way of thinking.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Manage feelings and handle stress
author: Unknown

quote: However ordinary each of us may seem, we are all in some way special, and can do things that are extraordinary, perhaps until then even thought impossible.
author: Roger Bannister, first person to run a mile in under four minutes

quote: People will throw stones at you, use them and build an empire.
author: Wild Woman Sisterhood

quote: Lack of will power has caused more failure than lack of intelligence or ability.
author: Flower A Newhouse

quote: Everything that is really great and inspiring is created by the individual who can labour in freedom.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The greatest blessings of mankind are within us and within our reach. A wise man is content with his lot, whatever it may be, without wishing for what he has not.
author: Seneca

quote: Take responsibility for your own happiness. By blaming others, you never have to face yourself or change your behaviour.
author: Bob Gass, author - UCB

quote: I firmly believe that success lies in the combination of both talent and business savvy, and that the magic comes through partnership between both.
author: Delphine Arnault

quote: I'm very determined, and I know I can achieve, so I don't let little setbacks put me down.
author: Ana Ivanovic

quote: The most effective deliberate practice activities are those which can be repeated at high volume.
author: Geoff Colvin

quote: Our mistakes won't irreparably damage our lives unless we let them.
author: James E Sweaney

quote: The actions you take each day create the results of your life. And since every action you take has been preceded by a thought (thinking truly is the ancestor of performance), what you focus on really does drive your reality.
author: Robin Sharman

quote: It's not possible to experience constant euphoria, but if you're grateful, you can find happiness in everything.
author: Pharrell Williams

quote: A garden is a grand teacher. It teaches patience and careful watchfulness; it teaches industry and thrift; above all it teaches entire trust.
author: Gertrude Jekyll

quote: A positive attitude is never automatic. You have to work at it.
author: Geoffrey James

quote: As I look back on my life, I realize that every time I thought I was being rejected from something good, I was actually being re-directed to something better.
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: Knowledge rests not upon truth alone, but upon error also.
author: Carl Jung

quote: The harder the conflict, the more glorious the triumph.'What we obtain too cheap, we esteem too lightly; it is dearness only that gives everything its value. I love the man that can smile in trouble that can gather strength from distress and grow.
author: Thomas Paine

quote: Gratitude is one of the sweet shortcuts to finding peace of mind and happiness inside. No matter what is going on outside of us, there's always something we could be grateful for.
author: Barry Neil Kaufman

quote: The difference between the successful and unsuccessful isn't the absence of obstacles, but the presence of perseverance.
author: Chris Widener

quote: The mind that opens to a new idea never returns to its original size.
author: Albert Einstein

topic: Not all practice leads to success
quote: Therefore, if I have to be a slave to habit, let me be a slave to good habits.
author: Og Mandino

quote: The essential difference between emotion and reason is that emotion leads to action while reason leads to conclusions.
author: Donald Calne

quote: To become a world class performer you must practice the right skills executed in the right way.
author: Mathew Syed

quote: A simple grateful thought turned heavenwards is the most perfect prayer.
author: Doris Lessing

quote: Students show positive growth when they believed that intelligence is malleable and when they learn about their brains.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: A teacher or a coach can see things you yourself won't pick up on. They will know the theory of each activity and understand how performance can be improved in that area.
author: Geoff Colvin

quote: To innovate, knowledge is crucial, because it takes the idea to a different level.
author: George Couros

quote: If you can dream it, you can achieve it
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Life must be lived and curiosity kept alive.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: To industry, nothing is impossible.
author: Latin proverb

quote: Shift and the world shifts with you
author: Honoree Corder

quote: You gotta play the hand that is dealt you. There may be pain in that hand but you play it.
author: James Brady

quote: In every adversity, there is a seed of an equivalent or greater benefit.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: The biggest adventure you can ever take is to live the life of your dreams.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: I know the price of success: dedication,'hard work and an unremitting devotion to the things you want to see happen.
author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: Call the roll in your memory of conspicuously successful giants and you will be struck by the fact that almost every one of them encountered inordinate difficulties sufficient to crush all but the gamest of spirits. Edison went hungry many times before he became famous.
author: B. C. Forbes

quote: Entitlement is such a cancer, because it is void of gratitude.
author: Adam Smith

quote: Steve Jobs: America's Greatest Failure.
author: National Review

quote: The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: This world is a school, that and nothing more, and provided you learn your lesson, nothing else matters. It does not really matter whether you are rich or poor, cultured or simple, a king or a scavenger. These are only the roles that men enact on the stage of life.
author: Emmet Fox

quote: The moment somebody says to me, this is very risky, is the moment it becomes attractive to me.
author: Kate Capshaw

quote: It is essential, above all, that in making history we do not forget to learn by history, to see our mistakes as well as our successes, our weaknesses as well as our strengths.

quote: Humility and patience are the surest proof of Love
author: John Wesley

quote: In all human affairs there are efforts, there are results, and the strength of the effort is the measure of the results.
author: James Allen

quote: Change our perspective: learn to discover the opportunities in problems
author: Unknown

quote: He is a wise man who does not grieve for the things which he has not, but rejoices for those which he has.
author: Epictetus

quote: If you imagine less, less will be what you undoubtedly deserve.
author: Debbie Millman

quote: Don't let others define you. Don't let the past confine you. Take charge of your life with confidence and determination and there are no limits on what you can do or be.
author: Michael Josephson

quote: To know what is right and not do it is the worst cowardice.
author: Confucius

author: Peter Sims

quote: Emotional intelligence is a flexible set of skills that can be acquired and improved with practice.
author: Travis Bradberry

quote: Men's action depend to great extent upon fear. We do things either because we enjoy doing them or because we are afraid not to do them.
author: John Milburn

quote: Be like the bamboo the higher you grow the deeper you bow.
author: Chinese Proverb

quote: People very quickly define success due to the amount of money someone makes. In the end, I think everyone is searching for that experience. That's why we continue to go to the movies and watch television.

quote: I think when you work on fossils, and you realize that a species is there, and it's abundant for quite a long period of time, and then at some point it's no longer there, and so, when you look at that bigger picture, yes, you realize that either you change and adapt, or, as a species, you go extinct.
author: Louise Leakey

quote: Successful people build each other up. They motivate, inspire, and push. Unsuccessful people just hate, blame and complain.
author: Unknown

quote: I do not think that there is any other quality so essential to success of any kind, as the quality of perseverance. It overcomes almost everything, even nature.

author: Dorothy Height

quote: A hungry mind is as significant as intelligence and effort in determining academic performance
author: Von Strumm, Hell, & Chamorro-Premuzic

quote: Emotional Intelligence can be cultivated
author: Unknown

quote: The smallest act of kindness is worth more than the grandest intention.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: We have to fill our hearts with gratitude. Gratitude makes everything that we have more than enough.

quote: Give me a fish and I will eat for a day. Teach me to fish and I will eat for a lifetime.
author: Anonymous

quote: Have the courage to follow your heart and intuition. They somehow already know what you truly want to become.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Leaders are made, they are not born. They are made by hard effort, which is the price which all of us must pay to achieve any goal that is worthwhile.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: The future belongs to those who see possibilities before they become obvious.
author: John Scully

quote: There are more things in heaven and earth, Horatio, than are dreamt of in your philosophy.
author: Shakespeare's Hamlet

quote: Little strokes fell mighty trees
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Poverty, Frost, Famine, Rain, Disease, are the beadles and guardsmen that hold us to common sense.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Gratitude is the most exquisite form of courtesy.
author: Jacques Maritain

quote: True happiness does not come from our reaching our goal, but from living a rich and meaningful life which is directed by our values. Unlike goals, values can't be completed or ticked off a list. They are a direction we desire to keep moving in, an ongoing process that never reaches an end.
author: Russ Harris.

quote: The future belongs to those who see possibilities before they become obvious.
author: John Scully

quote: Adaptability to change is itself a hallmark of successful education.
author: Peter Hilton

quote: Rome wasn't built in a day, but they were laying bricks every hour.
author: John Heywood

quote: Real success comes from the quality of your relationships and the emotions that you experience each day.
author: Unknown

quote: Don't wait for extraordinary opportunities. Seize common occasions and make them great. Weak men wait for opportunities; strong men make them.
author: Orison Swett Marden

quote: The right sort of training carried out over a sufficient period of time leads to improvement.

quote: Life is not waiting for the storms to pass. It's about learning how to dance in the rain.
author: Vienne Greene.

quote: However beautiful the strategy, you should occasionally look at the results.
author: Sir Winston Churchill

quote: Don't wait until everything is just right. It will never be perfect. There will always be challenges, obstacles, and less-than-perfect conditions. So what? Get started now. With each step you take, you will grow stronger and stronger, more and more skilled, more and more self-confident, and more and more successful.
author: Mark Victor Hansen

quote: Your most unhappy customers are your greatest source of learning.
author: Bill Gates

quote: It's never crowded along the extra mile.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: People with growth mind-set don't see failure as a sign of inadequacy and are happy to take risks.

quote: Emotional Intelligence is a way of recognizing, understanding, and choosing how we think, feel, and act. It shapes our interactions with others and our understanding of ourselves.
author: Goleman Freedman et al

quote: Genius is not born, genius is raised.
author: Laszlo Polgar

quote: When we associate abilities with a part of our identity, receiving constructive criticism can feel more like a personal attack.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: A vision without a'strategy'remains an illusion.
author: Lee Bolman.

quote: The passion to get ahead is sometimes born of the fear lest we be left behind.
author: Eric Hoffer

quote: Ludwig van Beethoven - No talent for music, as a composer he is hopeless.
author: Music teacher

quote: Knowledge speaks but wisdom listens
author: Jimi Hendrix

quote: Our world is obsessed with success. But how does God define success? Success in God's eyes is faithfulness to His calling.
author: Billy Graham

quote: My scientific work is motivated by an irresistible longing to understand the secrets of nature and by no other feelings.
author: Albert Einstein

author: Carol Dweck

quote: I knew that if I failed I wouldn't regret that, but I knew the one thing I might regret is not trying.
author: Jeff Bezos

quote: Your teacher can open the door, but you must enter by yourself.
author: A Chinese Proverb

quote: By believing passionately in something that still does not exist, we create it. The non-existent is whatever we have not sufficiently desired.
author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quote: Look at everything as though you were seeing it for the first or the last time, then your time on earth will be filled with glory.
author: Betty Smith

quote: No matter what role innate genetic endowment may play in the achievement of gifted people, the main gift that these people have is the same one we all have, the adaptability of the human brain and body, which they have taken advantage of more than the rest of us. We can also take advantage of this if we take control of our life. Over time, with hard work and dedication we can transform our abilities into something graceful and natural.
author: Anders Ericsson and Robert Pool, Peak

quote: People with high EQs master their emotions because they understand them, and they use an extensive vocabulary of feelings to do so.
author: Travis Bradberry

author: Glenn Llopis Forbes

quote: What can hinder our motivation?
author: Unknown

quote: In a growth mind-set, challenges are exciting rather than threatening. So rather than thinking, oh, I'm going to reveal my weaknesses, you say, wow, here's a chance to grow.

author: Yo-Yo-Ma cellist.

quote: The most important single influence in the life of a person is another person ' who is worthy of emulation.
author: Paul D Shafer

quote: Talent and intelligence never yet inoculated anyone against the caprice of the fates.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: Never try to be better than someone else, but always be learning from others. Never cease trying to be the best you can be. One is under your control; the other isn't.
author: John Wooden, Coach, 10x National Champion

quote: I really believe that everyone has a talent, ability, or skill that he can mine to support himself and to succeed in life.
author: Dean Koontz

quote: Nothing is as infectious as example.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: 'Success is not final; failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston S. Churchill

quote: Deliberate practice involves doing something so many times in practice you can perform flawlessly in the heat of competition.
author: Geoff Colvin

quote: We can do whatever we wish to do provided our wish is strong enough .. What do you want most to do? That's what I have to keep asking myself, in the face of difficulties.
author: Katherine Mansfield

quote: Most top performers practice for around 10,000 hours per year.
author: Malcolm Gladwell

quote: No man ever progressed to greatness and goodness but through great mistakes.
author: Frederick Robertson

quote: The most beautiful people we have known are those who have known defeat, known suffering, known struggle, known loss, and have found their way out of those depths.
author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quote: Life is about making an impact, not making an income. Kevin Kruse
author: Unknown

quote: Criticism, like rain, should be gentle enough to nourish a man's growth without destroying his roots.
author: Frank A. Clark

quote: Happiness always looks small while you hold it in your hands, but let it go, and you learn at once how big and precious it is.
author: Maxim Gorky

author: Charles Darwin

quote: Success isn't just about what you accomplish in your life; it's about what you inspire others to do.
author: Unknown

quote: Nurture your mind with great thoughts
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
author: Thomas Edison

quote: Do one thing every day that scares you.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Perseverance will take you to places that talent can't even dream of.
author: Anonymous

quote: Failure can be a reward, for it is through failure that we can learn the most.
author: M. Ricci

quote: Virtually nothing comes out right the first time. Failures, repeated failures, are finger posts on the road to achievement. The only time you don't want to fail is the last time you try something' One fails forward toward success.
author: Charles F Kettering

quote: Sure sign of spiritual growth: You want more freedom, less stuff.
author: Lisa Villa Prosen

quote: Successful people have fear, successful people have doubts, and successful people have worries. They just don't let these feelings stop them.
author: T. Harv Eker

quote: Life has a way of presenting challenges that disguise themselves as dead ends, hopeless situations that seem impossible to overcome. In the midst of these challenges it may feel like the only option is to roll over, surrender, and admit defeat; but maybe there is another way. While these challenges may appear as dead ends, they are often times Divine opportunities waiting to be realized. Your dead end may be: Failure like Michael J Fox, Poverty like Oprah Winfrey, Sin like King David, tragedy like Jesus, multiple academic failures like Kevin V Gresham II, whatever your situation ' however final your dead end may seem ' God can if you call on him, he will show up in the midst of your problem and turn things around for your good and his glory.
author: Kevin V Gresham II

quote: Every man is free to rise as far as he's able or willing, but the degree to which he thinks determines the degree to which he'll rise.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: Subtlety may deceive you; integrity never will.
author: Oliver Cromwell

quote: I believe in intuition and inspiration. Imagination is more important than knowledge. For knowledge is limited, whereas imagination embraces the entire world, stimulating progress, giving birth to evolution. It is, strictly speaking, a real factor in scientific research.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: All that is valuable in human society depends upon the opportunity for development accorded the individual.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: The human race is governed by its imagination.
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: Sometimes struggles are exactly what we need in our lives -  If God allowed us to go through our lives without any obstacles, it would cripple us. We would not be as strong as what we could have been. We could never fly!

quote: Never consider yourself a victim. When you think you are a victim, you have given control of your life to someone else. You may not be able to control your circumstances, but you can control your response to your circumstances.

quote: Not what we say about our blessings, but how we use them is the true measure of our thanksgiving.
author: W. T Purkiser

quote: Exploration is the engine that drives innovation. Innovation drives economic growth. So let's all go exploring.
author: Edith Widder

quote: Refusal to continuously test your vision against reality and adapt may lead to failure. Many companies have failed because of this. Ford's failure to continuously test his vision against reality led to the company's failure to continuously innovate, resulting in a catastrophic loss of market share which it never recovered from.
author: Patrick Vlaskovits, Entrepreneur

quote: We rise by lifting others.
author: Robert Ingersoll

quote: Passion, dedication and persistence count the most when children are cultivating their intelligence and talents.
author: Carol Dweck

quote: Emotional Intelligence can help people make better decisions.
author: Daniel Goleman

quote: It is passion that drives creative achievers to labor in their field for decades.
author: Geoff Colvin

quote: Not everything that is faced can be changed, but nothing can be changed until it is faced.
author: James Baldwin

quote: Mind-sets are beliefs about yourself and your most basic qualities
author: Carol Dweck

quote: Creativity is never the creation of something from nothing.
author: Anthony Brandt and David Eagleman

quote: True humility does not know that it is humble. If it did, it would be proud from the contemplation of so fine a virtue.
author: Martin Luther

quote: All things come round to him who will but wait.
author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: With fame I become more and more stupid, which of course is a very common phenomenon.
author: Albert Einstein, To Heinrich Zangger, December 24 1919

quote: Social and Emotional intelligent is also important
author: Unknown

quote: Humility, like darkness reveals the heavenly lights.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Perceive, identify and manage emotions
author: Unknown

quote: When I am through learning, then I am through
author: John Wooden, Coach, 10x National Champion

quote: The alchemists in their search for gold discovered many other things of greater value.
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: When did I know I had talent? I think it started when I first started playing sports, organized sports.
author: LeBron James

quote: My mother said I must always be intolerant of ignorance but understanding of illiteracy. That some people, unable to go to school, were more educated and more intelligent than college professors.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Curiosity about life in all aspects, I think, is still the secret of great creative people.
author: Leo Burnett

quote: I know God will not give me anything I can't handle. I just wish that He didn't trust me so much.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: The greatest saint in the world is not he who prays most or fasts most; it is not he who gives alms, or is most eminent for temperance, chastity or justice. It is he who is most thankful to God.
author: William Law

quote: To rise above the majority, you must develop qualities and disciplines that the average person lacks. The most important factor in achieving great financial success is not the money. It is the kind of person you have to become to earn that money and then hold on to it.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: You must do the things you think you cannot do.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Have a well define goal with a strategy, deadline and a price tag. Identify the daily activities that matters most and execute them consistently, have a system to track your progress week after week, month after month
author: Claudiu Moldovan
